TEXT.Italian: Pickpockets have been plaguing the markets in %s2_city. Many people fear shopping in them and the watch captain complains that he needs to hire additional guards.
TEXT.Spanish: Los ladrones de bolsas han estado plagando los mercados en %s2_city. Mucha gente teme hacer ventas en ellos y el capitán de la guardia denuncia que necesita contratar guardias adicionales.

TEXT.English: Give the watch commander the money to hire more guards.
TEXT.French: Donnez-lui de l'argent pour engager des gardes.
TEXT.German: Gebt dem Wachhauptmann das Gold, um mehr Wachen anzuheuern.
TEXT.Italian: Give the watch commander the money to hire more guards.
TEXT.Spanish: Dadle al capitán el dinero para contratar más guardias.

TEXT.English: The watch commander is incompetent, fire him and hire another.
TEXT.French: C'est un incompétent, renvoyez-le et engagez quelqu'un d'autre.
TEXT.German: Der Wachhauptmann ist unfähig. Entlasst ihn und setzt einen neuen ein.
TEXT.Italian: The watch commander is incompetent, fire him and hire another.
TEXT.Spanish: El capitán es un incompetente, echadlo y contratad a otro.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Random -10 to +10 to the Crime Rate
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]aléatoirement de -10 à +10 au taux de criminalité
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]zufällig -10 bis +10 zur Verbrechensrate
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Random -10 to +10 to the Crime Rate
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Entre un -10 y +10 al Índice de Criminalidad al azar

TEXT.English: Send the nightwatch into the market disguised as citizens, have any pickpockets they catch executed.
TEXT.French: Envoyez la garde de nuit au marché déguisés en citoyens, et faites exécuter tous les voleurs qu'ils attraperont.
TEXT.German: Schickt die Nachtwache als Bürger verkleidet zum Markt und lasst diese jeden Dieb exekutieren, den sie erwischen.
TEXT.Italian: Send the nightwatch into the market disguised as citizens, have any pickpockets they catch executed.
TEXT.Spanish: Enviad a los vigilantes de la noche al mercado vestidos de paisano, que ejecuten a cualquier ladrón de bolsas que atrapen.

TEXT.English: Send an adept proficient in mind magic to search the visitors' minds for thievish intents.
TEXT.French: Send an adept proficient in mind magic to search the visitors' minds for thievish intents.
TEXT.German: Send an adept proficient in mind magic to search the visitors' minds for thievish intents.
TEXT.Italian: Send an adept proficient in mind magic to search the visitors' minds for thievish intents.
TEXT.Spanish: Send an adept proficient in mind magic to search the visitors' minds for thievish intents.

TEXT.English: An experiment in the Alchemy Lab of %s2_city has shown unusual results. The test subject, a young girl, could become a powerful aid to our armies.
TEXT.French: Une expérience dans le laboratoire d'Alchimie de %s2_city a montré des résultats étonnants. Le cobaye, une jeune fille, pourrait devenir un soutien très puissant pour nos armées.
TEXT.German: Ein Experiment im Alchemielabor in der Stadt %s2_city zeigt außergewöhnliche Ergebnisse. Das Testobjekt, eine junge Frau, könnte eine mächtige Unterstützung unserer Armeen werden.
TEXT.Italian: An experiment in the Alchemy Lab of %s2_city has shown unusual results. The test subject, a young girl, could become a powerful aid to our armies.
TEXT.Spanish: Un experimento en los Laboratorios de Alquimia de %s2_city ha dado resultados inusuales. El sujeto, una joven chica, podría convertirse en una poderosa ayuda para nuestro ejercitos.

TEXT.English: The results of the experiments could forever taint the health of the city. Cancel everything, we will build our military through other means.
TEXT.French: Les résultats des experiences pourraient affecter la santé de la ville éternellement. Annulez tout, nous améliorerons notre armement par d'autres moyens.
TEXT.German: Es könnte die Stadt auf ewig verseuchen. Stoppt die Experimente. Wir werden unsere Armee mit anderen Mitteln aufbauen.
TEXT.Italian: The results of the experiments could forever taint the health of the city. Cancel everything, we will build our military through other means.
TEXT.Spanish: Los resultados del experimento podrían afectar permanentemente la salud de la ciudad. Cancelad los experimentos, levantaremos nuestro ejército por otros medios.

TEXT.English: Continue the experiments, we will deal with the results.
TEXT.French: Continuez les expériences, nous nous occuperons des résultats.
TEXT.German: Führt die Experimente fort. Wir werden mit den Ergebnissen umzugehen wissen.
TEXT.Italian: Continue the experiments, we will deal with the results.
TEXT.Spanish: Continuad los experimentos, nos ocuparemos de los resultados.

TEXT.English: Continue the experiments.
TEXT.French: Continuez les expériences.
TEXT.German: Führt die Experimente fort.
TEXT.Italian: Continue the experiments.
TEXT.Spanish: Continuad los experimentos.

TEXT.English: My lord, one of our mercenary divisions requests additional payment or it threatens to abandon our service.
TEXT.French: My lord, one of our mercenary divisions requests additional payment or it threatens to abandon our service.
TEXT.German: Eine unserer Söldnereinheiten verlangt eine bessere Bezahlung. Andernfalls drohen sie damit, unsere Dienste zu verlassen.
TEXT.Italian: My lord, one of our mercenary divisions requests additional payment or it threatens to abandon our service.
TEXT.Spanish: My lord, one of our mercenary divisions requests additional payment or it threatens to abandon our service.

TEXT.English: Pay them, and make sure they earn it on the front lines.
TEXT.French: Pay them, and make sure they earn it on the front lines.
TEXT.German: Bezahlt, was sie verlangen, und stellt sicher, dass sie es sich an vorderster Front verdienen.
TEXT.Italian: Pay them, and make sure they earn it on the front lines.
TEXT.Spanish: Pay them, and make sure they earn it on the front lines.

TEXT.English: Let them go, we will be better served by more loyal troops.
TEXT.French: Let them go, we will be better served by more loyal troops.
TEXT.German: Lasst sie ziehen. Wir sind mit loyaleren Truppen besser bedient.
TEXT.Italian: Let them go, we will be better served by more loyal troops.
TEXT.Spanish: Let them go, we will be better served by more loyal troops.

TEXT.English: I'm sure we can come to a compromise.
TEXT.French: I'm sure we can come to a compromise.
TEXT.German: Wir werden sicherlich einen Kompromiss finden.
TEXT.Italian: I'm sure we can come to a compromise.
TEXT.Spanish: I'm sure we can come to a compromise.

TEXT.English: A mercenary offers his services in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Un mercenaire offre ses services à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Ein Söldner bietet in der Stadt %s2_city seine Dienste an.
TEXT.Italian: A mercenary offers his services in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Un mercenario ofrece sus servicios en %s2_city.

TEXT.English: We could use the addition to our military.
TEXT.French: Nous pourrions l'ajouter à l'armée.
TEXT.German: Unsere Armeen könnten eine Verstärkung gut gebrauchen.
TEXT.Italian: We could use the addition to our military.
TEXT.Spanish: Podríamos usar esa adición a nuestro ejército.

TEXT.English: A great merchant in %s2_city believes his contributions are unappreciated and he threatens to leave your service unless he receives considerable remuneration.
TEXT.French: A great merchant in %s2_city believes his contributions are unappreciated and he threatens to leave your service unless he receives considerable remuneration.
TEXT.German: Ein großer Händler in der Stadt %s2_city glaubt, dass seine Leistungen nicht geschätzt werden, und droht damit Eure Dienste zu verlassen, außer er erhält eine großzügige Vergütung.
TEXT.Italian: A great merchant in %s2_city believes his contributions are unappreciated and he threatens to leave your service unless he receives considerable remuneration.
TEXT.Spanish: Un gran mercader en %s2_city cree que sus contribuciones no son apreciadas y amenaza con abandonar vuestro servicio a menos que reciba una remuneración considerable.

TEXT.English: Thank him for his service and allow him to pursue his own interests.
TEXT.French: Thank him for his service and allow him to pursue his own interests.
TEXT.German: Dankt ihm für seine Dienste und lasst ihn seinen eigenen Geschäften nachgehen.
TEXT.Italian: Thank him for his service and allow him to pursue his own interests.
TEXT.Spanish: Agradecedle sus servicios y dejadle perseguir sus propios intereses.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is retired
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is retired
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is retired
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is retired
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is retired

TEXT.English: Pay his demands.
TEXT.French: Pay his demands.
TEXT.German: Geht auf seine Forderungen ein.
TEXT.Italian: Pay his demands.
TEXT.Spanish: Acceded a sus demandas.

TEXT.English: We cannot allow him to fall into the service of our enemies, have him killed.
TEXT.French: We cannot allow him to fall into the service of our enemies, have him killed.
TEXT.German: Wir können nicht zulassen, dass er in den Dienst unserer Feinde tritt. Lasst ihn töten.
TEXT.Italian: We cannot allow him to fall into the service of our enemies, have him killed.
TEXT.Spanish: No podemos dejar que sirva a nuestros enemigos, haced que lo maten.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is killed
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is killed
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is killed
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is killed
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is killed

TEXT.English: A stone has fallen from the sky and landed outside the city of %s2_city. It continues to burn even days after its descent. Our scholars claim that it is a fragment of Bhall's heaven. What should we do with the stone?
TEXT.French: A stone has fallen from the sky and landed outside the city of %s2_city. It continues to burn even days after its descent. Our scholars claim that it is a fragment of Bhall's heaven. What should we do with the stone?
TEXT.German: Ein Fels ist vom Himmel gestürzt und nahe der Stadt %s2_city eingeschlagen. Tage später brennt er immer noch. Unsere Gelehrten behaupten, dass es ein Stück von Bhalls Himmel ist. Was sollen wir mit dem Fels machen?
TEXT.Italian: A stone has fallen from the sky and landed outside the city of %s2_city. It continues to burn even days after its descent. Our scholars claim that it is a fragment of Bhall's heaven. What should we do with the stone?
TEXT.Spanish: A stone has fallen from the sky and landed outside the city of %s2_city. It continues to burn even days after its descent. Our scholars claim that it is a fragment of Bhall's heaven. What should we do with the stone?

TEXT.English: Sell the stone to fill our treasury.
TEXT.French: Sell the stone to fill our treasury.
TEXT.German: Verkauft den Fels und füllt unsere Schatzkammern.
TEXT.Italian: Sell the stone to fill our treasury.
TEXT.Spanish: Sell the stone to fill our treasury.

TEXT.English: Have one of our enchanters imbue a staff with the stone's power.
TEXT.French: Have one of our enchanters imbue a staff with the stone's power.
TEXT.German: Lasst einen unserer Zauberer einen Stab erschaffen, der die Macht des Felsens in sich aufnehmen kann.
TEXT.Italian: Have one of our enchanters imbue a staff with the stone's power.
TEXT.Spanish: Have one of our enchanters imbue a staff with the stone's power.

TEXT.English: It is a religious artifact, keep it to remind us of Bhall's power.
TEXT.French: It is a religious artifact, keep it to remind us of Bhall's power.
TEXT.German: Es ist ein religiöses Artefakt. Stellt es aus, damit es uns immer an Bhalls Macht erinnert.
TEXT.Italian: It is a religious artifact, keep it to remind us of Bhall's power.
TEXT.Spanish: It is a religious artifact, keep it to remind us of Bhall's power.

TEXT.English: Scouts report strange creatures moving within the smoke.
TEXT.French: Scouts report strange creatures moving within the smoke.
TEXT.German: Späher berichten von seltsamen Kreaturen, die sich im Rauch bewegen.
TEXT.Italian: Scouts report strange creatures moving within the smoke.
TEXT.Spanish: Los batidores informan de extrañas criaturas moviéndose entre la niebla.

TEXT.English: A wealthy woman in %s2_city was found dead in her study, the back of her head crushed in by a hammer. The judge asks for your wisdom in the matter.
TEXT.French: A wealthy woman in %s2_city was found dead in her study, the back of her head crushed in by a hammer. The judge asks for your wisdom in the matter.
TEXT.German: Eine reiche Dame wurde in der Stadt %s2_city tot in ihrem Zimmer aufgefunden. Der Hinterkopf wurde durch einen Hammer zerschmettert. Der Richter bittet um Euren Rat in dieser Angelegenheit.
TEXT.Italian: A wealthy woman in %s2_city was found dead in her study, the back of her head crushed in by a hammer. The judge asks for your wisdom in the matter.
TEXT.Spanish: Una mujer adinerada de %s2_city ha sido encontrada muerta en su estudio, con la nuca aplastada por el ataque de un martillo. El juez os pide vuestra sabiduría en este asunto.

TEXT.English: Convict the husband. He claims he heard her scream and ran into the study to find her body.
TEXT.French: Convict the husband. He claims he heard her scream and ran into the study to find her body.
TEXT.German: Verurteilt den Ehemann. Er behauptet, er habe ihren Schrei gehört und dann ihre Leiche aufgefunden.
TEXT.Italian: Convict the husband. He claims he heard her scream and ran into the study to find her body.
TEXT.Spanish: Encerrad al marido. Asegura haberla oído gritar y correr hacia su estudio sólo para encontrar su cuerpo.

TEXT.English: Convict the butler. Some say he was having an affair with the woman, and he claims to have been sleeping in his room across from the study when the murder happened. He was awoken by the husband's screams for help.
TEXT.French: Convict the butler. Some say he was having an affair with the woman, and he claims to have been sleeping in his room across from the study when the murder happened. He was awoken by the husband's screams for help.
TEXT.German: Verurteilt den Hausdiener. Einige sagen, er habe eine Affäre mit der Dame gehabt. Er behauptet, er habe in seiner Kammer gegenüber ihres Zimmers geschlafen, als der Mord stattfand, und sei durch den Schrei des Ehemannes geweckt worden.
TEXT.Italian: Convict the butler. Some say he was having an affair with the woman, and he claims to have been sleeping in his room across from the study when the murder happened. He was awoken by the husband's screams for help.
TEXT.Spanish: Encerrad al criado. Algunos dicen que estaba teniendo una aventura con la mujer, y que asegura haber estado durmiendo en su habitación enfrente del estudio cuando ocurrió el asesinato. Se despertó por los gritos de ayuda del marido.

TEXT.English: Convict the houseguard. He had only been working in the house for a few weeks and is new to the city. He was guarding the front door to the manor and ran up to the study after hearing the husband's screams.
TEXT.French: Convict the houseguard. He had only been working in the house for a few weeks and is new to the city. He was guarding the front door to the manor and ran up to the study after hearing the husband's screams.
TEXT.German: Verurteilt den Hauswächter. Er arbeitet erst seit einigen Wochen im Hause und ist neu in der Stadt. Er bewachte die Vordertür zum Anwesen und rannte zum Zimmer, nachdem er den Ehemann schreien hörte.
TEXT.Italian: Convict the houseguard. He had only been working in the house for a few weeks and is new to the city. He was guarding the front door to the manor and ran up to the study after hearing the husband's screams.
TEXT.Spanish: Encerrad al guardia de la casa. Sólo ha estado trabajando en la casa durante unas pocas semanas y es nuevo en la ciudad. Estaba vigilando la puerta principal de la propiedad y corrió hacia el estudio después de oir los gritos del marido.

TEXT.English: There isn't enough evidence to convict, let all three go.
TEXT.French: There isn't enough evidence to convict, let all three go.
TEXT.German: Es gibt nicht genug Beweise. Lasst alle drei frei.
TEXT.Italian: There isn't enough evidence to convict, let all three go.
TEXT.Spanish: No hay suficiente evidencia para encerrar a nadie, dejad a los tres que se vayan.

TEXT.English: Your people have discovered rare edible mushrooms.
TEXT.French: Vos gens ont découvert une variété rare de champignons comestibles.
TEXT.German: Eure Untertanen haben seltene essbare Pilze entdeckt.
TEXT.Italian: Your people have discovered rare edible mushrooms.
TEXT.Spanish: Your people have discovered rare edible mushrooms.

TEXT.English: Your unit encounters a flare of chaos mana.
TEXT.French: Votre unité a rencontré un nuage de mana du chaos.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit stößt auf ein Leuchtfeuer des Chaosmana.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit encounters a flare of chaos mana.
TEXT.Spanish: Vuestra unidad encuentra una llamarada de maná de caos.

TEXT.English: Enter the flare, it will strengthen our unit.
TEXT.French: Qu'il traverse, cela le rendra plus puissant.
TEXT.German: Geht hinein. Es wird die Einheit stärken.
TEXT.Italian: Enter the flare, it will strengthen our unit.
TEXT.Spanish: Que entre en la llamarada, fortalecerá nuestra unidad.

TEXT.English: Don't go near it, it is too dangerous.
TEXT.French: Qu'il ne s'en approche pas, c'est trop dangereux.
TEXT.German: Bleibt ihm fern. Es ist zu gefährlich.
TEXT.Italian: Don't go near it, it is too dangerous.
TEXT.Spanish: Que no se acerque a ella, es muy peligrosa.

TEXT.English: Our people have found a tree in the forests outside of %s2_city that sparkles with thousands of lights after sunset. People are awed by the beauty of it, though some say the spirits of the dead dance in its branches.
TEXT.French: Our people have found a tree in the forests outside of %s2_city that sparkles with thousands of lights after sunset. People are awed by the beauty of it, though some say the spirits of the dead dance in its branches.
TEXT.German: Einige unserer Bürger haben im Wald außerhalb der Stadt %s2_city einen Baum gefunden, der nach Sonnenuntergang wie tausend Lichter glitzert. Die Bürger sind von seiner Schönheit beeindruckt, obwohl einige der Meinung sind, dass die Seelen der Toten in seinen Zweigen tanzen.
TEXT.Italian: Our people have found a tree in the forests outside of %s2_city that sparkles with thousands of lights after sunset. People are awed by the beauty of it, though some say the spirits of the dead dance in its branches.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestro pueblo ha encontrado un árbol en el bosque de las afueras de %s2_city que brilla con miles de luces después de la puesta de sol. La gente está impresionada por su belleza, aunque algunos dicen que los espíritus de los muertos bailan entre sus ramas.

TEXT.English: Such a spectacle shouldn't be hidden in the forest. Cut it down and have it moved to the city's courtyard.
TEXT.French: Such a spectacle shouldn't be hidden in the forest. Cut it down and have it moved to the city's courtyard.
TEXT.German: Ein solches Schauspiel sollte nicht im Wald versteckt sein. Fällt den Baum und stellt ihn auf dem Vorplatz der Stadt wieder auf.
TEXT.Italian: Such a spectacle shouldn't be hidden in the forest. Cut it down and have it moved to the city's courtyard.
TEXT.Spanish: Tal espectáculo no debería estar escondido en el bosque. Taladlo y trasladadlo al patio de la ciudad.

TEXT.English: Hire some priests to calm those spirits and send them into the afterlife.
TEXT.French: Hire some priests to calm those spirits and send them into the afterlife.
TEXT.German: Heuert einige Priester an, um die Seelen zu beruhigen und dann ins Jenseits zu schicken.
TEXT.Italian: Hire some priests to calm those spirits and send them into the afterlife.
TEXT.Spanish: Contratad algunos sacerdotes para calmar esos espíritus y que sean enviados a la otra vida.

TEXT.English: This is a gift of Cernunnos, make the area around the tree a sacred grove.
TEXT.French: This is a gift of Cernunnos, make the area around the tree a sacred grove.
TEXT.German: Es ist ein Geschenk von Cernunnos. Errichtet einen heiligen Hain um den Baum.
TEXT.Italian: This is a gift of Cernunnos, make the area around the tree a sacred grove.
TEXT.Spanish: Esto es un regalo de Cernunnos, haced que el área que rodea al árbol sea una temida arboleda.

TEXT.English: This defies the natural order, a tree should only be alight while burning. See that the natural order is restored...
TEXT.French: This defies the natural order, a tree should only be alight while burning. See that the natural order is restored...
TEXT.German: Dies besudelt die natürliche Ordnung. Ein Baum sollte nur leuchten, wenn er in Flammen steht. Sorgt dafür, dass die natürliche Ordnung wieder hergestellt wird...
TEXT.Italian: This defies the natural order, a tree should only be alight while burning. See that the natural order is restored...
TEXT.Spanish: Esto desafía al orden natural, un árbol sólo debería brillar cuando arde. Haced que el orden natural sea restaurado

TEXT.English: A riot has broken out between Order and Veil worshipers in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Des troubles ont éclaté entre les adorateurs de l'Ordre et du Voile à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Zwischen Anbetern der Weisung und des Schleiers sind Unruhen in der Stadt %s2_city ausgebrochen.
TEXT.Italian: A riot has broken out between Order and Veil worshipers in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Hay un alzamiento que enfrenta seguidores del Orden y del Velo en %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Order the local militia to arrest the Veil rioters.
TEXT.French: Ordonner à la milice locale d'arreter les emeutiers du Voile.
TEXT.German: Ruft die Bürgerwehr herbei, um die Aufrührer des Schleiers festnehmen zu lassen.
TEXT.Italian: Order the local militia to arrest the Veil rioters.
TEXT.Spanish: Ordenad a la milicia local que arreste a los alborotadores del Velo.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Ashen Veil from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Order cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Veil cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]50% de chances d'enlever le Voile de Cendres de la ville[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_HAPPY] dans les villes de l'Ordre[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_UNHAPPY] dans les villes du Voile
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass die Religion des Aschfahlen Schleiers aus der Stadt entfernt wird[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_HAPPY] in den Städten der Weisung[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_UNHAPPY] in den Städten des Aschfahlen Schleiers
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Ashen Veil from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Order cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Veil cities
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de eliminar el Velo Ceniciento de la ciudad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_HAPPY] en las ciudades del Orden[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_UNHAPPY] en las ciudades del Velo

TEXT.English: Order the local militia to arrest the Order rioters.
TEXT.French: Ordonner à la milice locale d'arreter les emeutiers de l'Ordre.
TEXT.German: Ruft die Bürgerwehr herbei, um die Aufrührer der Weisung festnehmen zu lassen.
TEXT.Italian: Order the local militia to arrest the Order rioters.
TEXT.Spanish: Ordenad a la milicia local que arreste a los alborotadores del Orden.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Order from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Veil cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Order cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]50% de chances de retirer l'Ordre de la ville[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_HAPPY] dans les villes du Voile[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 tours [ICON_UNHAPPY] dans les villes de l'Ordre
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass die Religion der Weisung aus der Stadt entfernt wird[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_HAPPY] in den Städten des Aschfahlen Schleiers[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_UNHAPPY] in den Städten der Weisung
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Order from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Veil cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Order cities
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de eliminar el Orden de la ciudad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_HAPPY] en las ciudades del Velo[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_UNHAPPY] en las ciudades del Orden

TEXT.English: Do nothing, let the people determine their own fate.
TEXT.French: Ne rien faire, laisser le peuple décider de son propre destin.
TEXT.German: Tut nichts. Lasst sie ihr eigenes Schicksal bestimmen.
TEXT.Italian: Do nothing, let the people determine their own fate.
TEXT.Spanish: No hagáis nada, que el pueblo determine su propio destino.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]25% chance to remove the Ashen Veil from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]25% chance to remove the Order from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance of -1 population
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]25% de chances d'enlever le Voile de Cendres de la ville[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]25% de chances d'enlever l'Ordre de la ville[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de chances de -1 citoyen
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]25% Chance, dass die Religion des Aschfahlen Schleiers aus der Stadt entfernt wird[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]25% Chance, dass die Religion der Weisung aus der Stadt entfernt wird[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass die Bevölkerung um 1 verringert wird
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]25% chance to remove the Ashen Veil from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]25% chance to remove the Order from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance of -1 population
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]25% de probabilidades de eliminar el Velo Ceniciento de la ciudad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]25% de probabilidades de eliminar el Orden de la ciudad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de -1 de población

TEXT.English: Throw everyone into the Dungeon until they calm down.
TEXT.French: Mettez tout le monde en prison jusqu'à ce qu'ils se calment.
TEXT.German: Lasst alle in die Kerker werfen, bis sie sich beruhigt haben.
TEXT.Italian: Throw everyone into the Dungeon until they calm down.
TEXT.Spanish: Echadlos a todos a la Mazmorra hasta que se calmen.

TEXT.English: Order worshipers in %s2_city threaten to burn down a Temple of the Veil.
TEXT.French: Les adorateurs de l'Ordre à %s2_city menacent de brûler un temple du Voile.
TEXT.German: Anbeter der Weisung in der Stadt %s2_city drohen damit, einen Tempel des Schleiers niederzubrennen.
TEXT.Italian: Order worshipers in %s2_city threaten to burn down a Temple of the Veil.
TEXT.Spanish: Los seguidores del Orden de %s2_city amenazan con quemar un Templo del Velo.

TEXT.English: Order the local militia to help burn down the temple
TEXT.French: Ordonner à la milice locale d'aider à brûler le temple
TEXT.German: Ruft die Bügerwehr herbei, um ihnen dabei zu helfen, den Tempel niederzubrennen.
TEXT.Italian: Order the local militia to help burn down the temple
TEXT.Spanish: Ordenad a la milicia local que ayuden a quemar el templo

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]The Temple of the Veil will be destroyed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Ashen Veil religion from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Order cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Veil cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Le temple du Voile sera détruit[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de chances d'enlever la religion du Voile de Cendres de la ville[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_HAPPY] dans les villes de l'Ordre[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_UNHAPPY] dans les villes du Voile
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Zerstörung des Tempels des Schleiers[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass die Religion des Aschfahlen Schleiers aus der Stadt entfernt wird[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_HAPPY] in den Städten der Weisung[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_UNHAPPY] in den Städten des Aschfahlen Schleiers
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]The Temple of the Veil will be destroyed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Ashen Veil religion from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Order cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Veil cities
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]El Templo del Velo será destruido[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de eliminar la religión del Velo Ceniciento de la ciudad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_HAPPY] en las ciudades del Orden[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_UNHAPPY] en las ciudades del Velo

TEXT.English: Do nothing, let the people determine their own fate.
TEXT.French: Ne rien faire, laisser le peuple choisir son propre destin.
TEXT.German: Tut nichts. Lasst sie ihr eigenes Schicksal bestimmen.
TEXT.Italian: Do nothing, let the people determine their own fate.
TEXT.Spanish: No hagáis nada, dejad que el pueblo determine su propio destino.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]50% chance the Temple of the Veil will be destroyed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance of -1 population[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Ashen Veil religion from the city
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]50% de chances que le temple du Voile soit détruit[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de chances de -1 citoyen[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de chances d'enlever la religion du Voile de Cendres de la ville
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass der Tempel des Schleiers zerstört wird[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass die Bevölkerung um 1 verringert wird[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass die Religion des Aschfahlen Schleiers aus der Stadt entfernt wird
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]50% chance the Temple of the Veil will be destroyed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance of -1 population[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Ashen Veil religion from the city
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de que el Templo del Velo sea destruido[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de -1 de población[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de eliminar la religión del Velo Ceniciento de la ciudad

TEXT.English: Send the local militia to protect the temple.
TEXT.French: Envoyer la milice locale protéger le temple.
TEXT.German: Schickt die Bürgerwehr, um den Tempel zu beschützen.
TEXT.Italian: Send the local militia to protect the temple.
TEXT.Spanish: Enviad a la milicia local para proteger el templo.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Veil cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Order cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_HAPPY] dans les villes du Voile[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_UNHAPPY] dans les villes de l'Ordre
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_HAPPY] in den Städten des Aschfahlen Schleiers[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_UNHAPPY] in den Städten der Weisung
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Veil cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Order cities
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_HAPPY] en las ciudades del Velo[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_UNHAPPY] en las ciudades del Orden

TEXT.English: An orphanage in %s2_city has burnt down. The restless souls of the children killed in the fire continue to haunt the area.
TEXT.French: An orphanage in %s2_city has burnt down. The restless souls of the children killed in the fire continue to haunt the area.
TEXT.German: Ein Waisenhaus in der Stadt %s2_city ist niedergebrannt. Die rastlosen Seelen der verbrannten Kinder spuken nun in den Ruinen.
TEXT.Italian: An orphanage in %s2_city has burnt down. The restless souls of the children killed in the fire continue to haunt the area.
TEXT.Spanish: Se ha quemado un orfanato de %s2_city. Las almas sin descanso de los niños muertos en el fuego siguen frecuentando el área.

TEXT.English: There is little we can do.
TEXT.French: There is little we can do.
TEXT.German: Wir können daran kaum etwas ändern.
TEXT.Italian: There is little we can do.
TEXT.Spanish: Hay poco que podamos hacer.

TEXT.English: Sanctify the area to put their souls to rest.
TEXT.French: Sanctify the area to put their souls to rest.
TEXT.German: Segnet die Ruinen, damit ihre Seelen Ruhe finden.
TEXT.Italian: Sanctify the area to put their souls to rest.
TEXT.Spanish: Santificad el área para dar descanso a sus almas. (requiere maná de Vida)

TEXT.English: Bind their souls into our service.
TEXT.French: Bind their souls into our service.
TEXT.German: Bindet ihre Seelen und zwingt sie in unseren Dienst.
TEXT.Italian: Bind their souls into our service.
TEXT.Spanish: Poned sus almas a nuestro servicio. (requiere maná de Muerte)

TEXT.English: The Overcouncil has offered additional support to your empire.
TEXT.French: Le Conseil Supérieur a offert de soutenir votre empire.
TEXT.German: Der Hohe Rat bietet Eurem Reich Unterstützung an.
TEXT.Italian: The Overcouncil has offered additional support to your empire.
TEXT.Spanish: El Gran Consejo ofrece soporte adicional a vuestro imperio.

TEXT.English: Accept some financial support
TEXT.French: Accepter une aide financière
TEXT.German: Finanzielle Hilfe wäre willkommen.
TEXT.Italian: Accept some financial support
TEXT.Spanish: Aceptáis algo de ayuda financiera

TEXT.English: Request that some of the Radiant Guard be stationed in your empire
TEXT.French: Demander à ce que quelques Gardes Rayonnants stationnent dans vore empire
TEXT.German: Ersucht darum, dass einige Einheiten der Strahlenden Wache in unserem Reich stationiert werden.
TEXT.Italian: Request that some of the Radiant Guard be stationed in your empire
TEXT.Spanish: Pedís algunos Guardias Brillantes para ser estacionados en vuestro imperio

TEXT.English: Allow the councilors to train your priests
TEXT.French: Autoriser les conseillers à entrainer vos prêtres
TEXT.German: Erlaubt ihnen die Ausbildung unserer Priester.
TEXT.Italian: Allow the councilors to train your priests
TEXT.Spanish: Permitís a los consejeros entrenar a vuestros sacerdotes

TEXT.English: Your %s3_unit comes to you. Parith, an elven diplomat from the Umbrawood, has brought news that the elves are under attack. Your unit wants permission to leave this region and travel to the Umbrawood to aide the elves.
TEXT.French: Your %s3_unit comes to you. Parith, an elven diplomat from the Umbrawood, has brought news that the elves are under attack. Your unit wants permission to leave this region and travel to the Umbrawood to aide the elves.
TEXT.German: [NUM3:Euer:Eure:Euer:Eure:Eure:Eure] %s3:1_unit kommt zu Euch. Parith, ein elfischer Diplomat aus dem Umbrawald, überbrachte Nachrichten von einem Angriff auf die Elfen. Euer Einheit möchte die Erlaubnis, dieses Gebiet zu verlassen und in den Umbrawald zu reisen, um die Elfen zu unterstützen.
TEXT.Italian: Your %s3_unit comes to you. Parith, an elven diplomat from the Umbrawood, has brought news that the elves are under attack. Your unit wants permission to leave this region and travel to the Umbrawood to aide the elves.
TEXT.Spanish: Your %s3_unit comes to you. Parith, an elven diplomat from the Umbrawood, has brought news that the elves are under attack. Your unit wants permission to leave this region and travel to the Umbrawood to aide the elves.

TEXT.English: No, we cannot afford to have you march off to a distant war that is probably long over.
TEXT.French: No, we cannot afford to have you march off to a distant war that is probably long over.
TEXT.German: Nein, wir können es uns nicht leisten, sie zu einem fernen Krieg marschieren zu lassen, der wahrscheinlich schon längst vorüber ist.
TEXT.Italian: No, we cannot afford to have you march off to a distant war that is probably long over.
TEXT.Spanish: No, we cannot afford to have you march off to a distant war that is probably long over.

TEXT.English: Go with my blessing.
TEXT.French: Go with my blessing.
TEXT.German: Geht mit meinem Segen.
TEXT.Italian: Go with my blessing.
TEXT.Spanish: Go with my blessing.

TEXT.English: Penguins have settled on a cold coastal part of your empire. Their antics entertain your people.
TEXT.French: Des manchots se sont installés sur une portion de côte froide de votre empire. Leur maladresse amuse votre peuple.
TEXT.German: Pinguine haben sich an einem eisigen Küstenabschnitt Eures Reiches angesiedelt. Ihre Possen amüsieren Eure Bürger.
TEXT.Italian: Penguins have settled on a cold coastal part of your empire. Their antics entertain your people.
TEXT.Spanish: Unos pingüinos se han asentado en una costa helada de vuestro imperio. Sus juegos entretienen a vuestro pueblo.

TEXT.English: What Alignment are you?
TEXT.French: Quel alignement souhaitez-vous ?
TEXT.German: Welche Gesinnung wählt Ihr?
TEXT.Italian: What Alignment are you?
TEXT.Spanish: What Alignment are you?

TEXT.English: Good
TEXT.French: Good
TEXT.German: Gut
TEXT.Italian: Good
TEXT.Spanish: Good

TEXT.English: Neutral
TEXT.French: Neutral
TEXT.German: Neutral
TEXT.Italian: Neutral
TEXT.Spanish: Neutral

TEXT.English: Evil
TEXT.French: Evil
TEXT.German: Böse
TEXT.Italian: Evil
TEXT.Spanish: Evil

TEXT.English: An enormous giant arrives at the outskirts of %s2_city. He looks over the local herd with a greedy leer and licks his pointed teeth; some pigs appear to recognize him and begin a pitiful squealing.[NEWLINE]"Ikol's pigs run away," he says. "Neighbors give back."
TEXT.French: An enormous giant arrives at the outskirts of %s2_city. He looks over the local herd with a greedy leer and licks his pointed teeth; some pigs appear to recognize him and begin a pitiful squealing.[NEWLINE]"Ikol's pigs run away," he says. "Neighbors give back."
TEXT.German: Ein gigantischer Riese erreicht den Stadtrand von %s2_city. Er sieht mit einem gierigen Blick über die dortige Schweineherde hinweg und leckt sich seine spitzen Zähne. Einige Schweine scheinen ihn zu erkennen und beginnen erbärmlich zu quieken.[NEWLINE]"Ikols Schweine laufen weg," sagt er. "Nachbarn geben zurück."
TEXT.Italian: An enormous giant arrives at the outskirts of %s2_city. He looks over the local herd with a greedy leer and licks his pointed teeth; some pigs appear to recognize him and begin a pitiful squealing.[NEWLINE]"Ikol's pigs run away," he says. "Neighbors give back."
TEXT.Spanish: An enormous giant arrives at the outskirts of %s2_city. He looks over the local herd with a greedy leer and licks his pointed teeth; some pigs appear to recognize him and begin a pitiful squealing.[NEWLINE]"Ikol's pigs run away," he says. "Neighbors give back."

TEXT.English: Certainly, what are neighbors for?
TEXT.French: Certainly, what are neighbors for?
TEXT.German: Sicherlich. Dafür sind Nachbarn doch da?
TEXT.Italian: Certainly, what are neighbors for?
TEXT.Spanish: Certainly, what are neighbors for?

TEXT.English: These worthless pigs are thin and sick. But our larders are heavy, friend, join us in a feast to remember!
TEXT.French: These worthless pigs are thin and sick. But our larders are heavy, friend, join us in a feast to remember!
TEXT.German: Diese wertlosen Schweine sind dünn und krank. Aber unsere Speisekammern sind voll, mein Freund. Feier mit uns ein unvergessliches Gelage!
TEXT.Italian: These worthless pigs are thin and sick. But our larders are heavy, friend, join us in a feast to remember!
TEXT.Spanish: These worthless pigs are thin and sick. But our larders are heavy, friend, join us in a feast to remember!

TEXT.English: Get your own, you slobbering oaf.
TEXT.French: Get your own, you slobbering oaf.
TEXT.German: Besorg dir deine eigenen, du sabbernder Trottel.
TEXT.Italian: Get your own, you slobbering oaf.
TEXT.Spanish: Get your own, you slobbering oaf.

TEXT.English: It would be an honor.
TEXT.French: Ce serait un honneur.
TEXT.German: Es würde mir eine Ehre sein.
TEXT.Italian: It would be an honor.
TEXT.Spanish: Sería un honor para mí.

TEXT.English: The queen of the Calabim invites you to experience the richness of her capital. Your advisors warn that men who do not live up to Alexis's expectations are killed or doomed to spend the rest of their life in the Calabim breeding pits. Some say that even those that perform well end up in the pits.
TEXT.French: La reine des Calabim vous propose d'expérimenter les richesses de sa capitale. Vos conseillers vous avertissent que les hommes qui ne satisfont pas les attentes d'Alexis sont tués ou condamnés à passer le reste de leur vie dans les puits à nourriture Calabims. Certains disent que même ceux qui y arrivent finissent dans les puits.
TEXT.German: Die Königin der Calabim lädt Euch ein, den Reichtum ihrer Hauptstadt zu erleben. Eure Berater warnen, dass jene Männer, die den Erwartungen von Alexis nicht gerecht werden, getötet oder verdammt werden, um für den Rest ihres Lebens in den Aufzuchtgruben der Calabim zu dienen. Manche munkeln, dass sogar diejenigen, die gute Leistungen zeigen, in den Gruben enden.
TEXT.Italian: The queen of the Calabim invites you to experience the richness of her capital. Your advisors warn that men who do not live up to Alexis's expectations are killed or doomed to spend the rest of their life in the Calabim breeding pits. Some say that even those that perform well end up in the pits.
TEXT.Spanish: La reina de Calabim os invita a experimentar la suontosidad de su capital. Vuestros consejeros os advierten que los hombres que no satisfacen las expectativas de Alexis son asesinados o condenados a pasar el resto de sus vidas en los pozos de alimentación Calabim. Algunos dicen que incluso aquellos que lo hacen bien también terminan en los pozos.

TEXT.English: Now you know why men still chase the dangerous Alexis, she is so beautiful that the hearts she is said to drink from could be given to her willingly. Despite the rumors you are allowed to leave the Calabim lands without difficulty, albeit with a few bite and scratch marks.
TEXT.French: Maintenant vous savez pourquoi les hommes continuent de chasser la dangereuse Alexis. Elle est si belle que les cœurs dont on dit qu'elle s'abreuse pourraient lui être donnés volontairement. Malgré les rumeurs, vous êtes autorisé à quitter les terres Calabims sans difficulté, à part quelques marques de morsures et de griffures.
TEXT.German: Nun wisst Ihr, warum die meisten Männer hinter der gefährlichen Alexis her sind. Sie ist so wunderschön, dass ihr die Herzen, von denen sie angeblich trinken soll, bereitwillig dargeboten werden. Entgegen den Gerüchten dürft Ihr das Land der Calabim ohne Schwierigkeiten verlassen, allerdings mit ein paar zusätzlichen Biss- und Kratzspuren.
TEXT.Italian: Now you know why men still chase the dangerous Alexis, she is so beautiful that the hearts she is said to drink from could be given to her willingly. Despite the rumors you are allowed to leave the Calabim lands without difficulty, albeit with a few bite and scratch marks.
TEXT.Spanish: Ahora sabéis por qué los hombres aún persiguen a la peligrosa Alexis, es tan bella que los corazones de los que se dice que bebe podrían serle entregados dispuestos. Pese a los rumores os es permitido abandonar las tierras Calabim sin dificultades, aunque con unos pocos mordiscos y marcas de arañazos.

TEXT.English: The summer court makes camp at the borders of the Ljosalfar empire. Arendel invites you to share a night of song and drink.
TEXT.French: La Cour de l'Eté construit un camp aux frontières de l'empire Ljosalfar. Arendel vous invite à partager une nuit de chants et de boissons.
TEXT.German: Der Selige Hof residiert an den Grenzen des Reiches der Ljosalfar. Arendel lädt Euch ein, an einer Nacht voller Wein und Gesang teilzuhaben.
TEXT.Italian: The summer court makes camp at the borders of the Ljosalfar empire. Arendel invites you to share a night of song and drink.
TEXT.Spanish: La corte del verano acampa en los bordes del imperio Ljosalfar. Arendel os invita a compartir una noche de música y bebida.

TEXT.English: Visions of Arendel and the memory of her touch will haunt you. You flee to your ship before her beauty makes you incapable of enjoying anyone else.
TEXT.French: Les visions d'Arendel et le souvenir de ses caresses vous hanteront. Vous fuyez dans votre vaisseau avant que sa beauté vous empèche profiter que quoique ce soit d'autre.
TEXT.German: Traumbilder von Arendel und die Erinnerung ihrer Berührung verfolgen Euch. Ihr flieht zu Eurem Schiff, bevor ihre Schönheit Euch unfähig macht, jemals wieder die Gesellschaft einer anderen Frau zu geniessen.
TEXT.Italian: Visions of Arendel and the memory of her touch will haunt you. You flee to your ship before her beauty makes you incapable of enjoying anyone else.
TEXT.Spanish: La visión de Arendel y la memoria de su caricia os persiguen. Huís a vuestro barco antes de que su belleza os haga incapaz de disfrutar de ninguna otra.

TEXT.English: A Bannor runner arrives at your capital with the message that Capria invites you to her palace for a private conference.
TEXT.French: Un messager Bannor arrive à votre capitale, annonçant que Capria vous invite en son palais pour une conférence privée.
TEXT.German: Ein Bote Bannors erreicht Eure Hauptstadt mit der Nachricht, dass Capria Euch in ihren Palast zu einer privaten Besprechung einlädt.
TEXT.Italian: A Bannor runner arrives at your capital with the message that Capria invites you to her palace for a private conference.
TEXT.Spanish: Un corredor Bannor llega a vuestra capital con un mensaje diciendo que Capria os invita a su palacio para una conferencia privada.

TEXT.English: The Bannor's focus on discipline and strength applies even to their queen's bedchambers. You leave feeling refreshed, but sore.
TEXT.French: Les préceptes Bannor sur la discipline et la force s'appliquent même dans la chambre à coucher de leur reine.Vous partez, à la fois revigoré et le corps endolori.
TEXT.German: Der Fokus der Bannor auf Disziplin und Stärke trifft auch auf das Schlafgemach ihrer Königin zu. Ihr verabschiedet Euch mit einem Gefühl der Frische, aber auch schmerzend im Gemark.
TEXT.Italian: The Bannor's focus on discipline and strength applies even to their queen's bedchambers. You leave feeling refreshed, but sore.
TEXT.Spanish: La concentración en la disciplina y la fuerza de los Bannor también se aplica incluso a los dormitorios de la reina. Os marcháis sintiéndoos reanimado, pero con dolores.

TEXT.English: A poem arrives, penned by Ethne herself. She invites you to share her company for a banquet in your honor.
TEXT.French: Un poème arrive, de la main d'Ethne elle-même. Elle vous invite à partager en sa compagnie un banquet en votre honneur.
TEXT.German: Ein Gedicht trifft ein, von Ethne selbst verfasst. Sie lädt Euch ein, ihre Gesellschaft zu teilen, für ein Bankett zu Eurer Ehre.
TEXT.Italian: A poem arrives, penned by Ethne herself. She invites you to share her company for a banquet in your honor.
TEXT.Spanish: Os llega un poema, de la mano de la misma Ethne. Os invita a compartir su compañía para un banquete en vuestro honor.

TEXT.English: Ethne's banquet was as graceful and beautiful as the queen herself. You longed to stay with the gentle queen, but your restless spirit eventually sent you back to your waiting ship. You look forward to your next meeting.
TEXT.French: Le banquet d'Ethne était aussi beau et délicieux que la reine elle-même. Vous désiriez rester avec la douce reine mais votre esprit insatiable vous ramène vers votre vaisseau. Vous pensez déjà à votre prochaine rencontre.
TEXT.German: Ethnes Bankett war so anmutig und schön wie die Königin selbst. Ihr ersehnt bei der sanftmütigen Königin zu verweilen, doch Eure rastlose Seele trieb Euch letztendlich zurück zu Eurem wartenden Schiff. Ihr freut Euch schon auf eure nächste Begegnung.
TEXT.Italian: Ethne's banquet was as graceful and beautiful as the queen herself. You longed to stay with the gentle queen, but your restless spirit eventually sent you back to your waiting ship. You look forward to your next meeting.
TEXT.Spanish: El banquete de Ethne fue tan esplendoroso y precioso como la misma reina. Deseásteis quedaros con la amable reina, pero vuestro espíritu incansable os envió de vuelta a vuestra nave espectante. Pensáis en vuestro siguente encuentro.

TEXT.English: Faeryl stands shimmering in the moonlight before disappearing into the forest. The Svartalfar are not seen by accident, she must be enticing you to follow her.
TEXT.French: Faeryl apparaît à la lumière de la lune, avant de disparaître dans la forêt. Les Svartalfar ne se laissent pas voir par accident, elle doit vous inciter à la suivre.
TEXT.German: Faeryl stand schimmernd im Mondlichte, bevor sie in den Wald verschwand. Die Svartalfar trifft man nicht durch Zufall. Sie verlockt Euch, ihr zu folgen.
TEXT.Italian: Faeryl stands shimmering in the moonlight before disappearing into the forest. The Svartalfar are not seen by accident, she must be enticing you to follow her.
TEXT.Spanish: Faeryl permanece en pie brillando tenuemente bajo la luz de la luna antes de desaparecer en el bosque. Los Svartalfar no son avistados por accidente, debe estar incitándoos para seguirla.

TEXT.English: Faeryl's seduction is intoxicating. She is as beautiful as the night and her kisses alone are enough to wage war over. Except for the morning requirement to escape from the chains she placed you in while you slept it was a perfect rendezvous.
TEXT.French: La séduction de Faeryl est toxique. Elle est aussi belle que la nuit et ses seuls baisers sont assez pour déclencher une guerre. A part le besoin de s'échapper des chaînes qu'elles vous avait accroché pendant votre sommeil, c'était un parfait rendez-vous.
TEXT.German: Faeryls Verführung ist berauschend. Sie ist so wundervoll wie die Nacht selbst und ihre Küsse allein reichen aus, um einen Krieg anzuzetteln. Abgesehen davon, in der Morgenröte aus den Ketten zu entkommen, die sie Euch in der Nacht, während Ihr geschlafen habt, verpasste, war es ein perfektes Rendezvous.
TEXT.Italian: Faeryl's seduction is intoxicating. She is as beautiful as the night and her kisses alone are enough to wage war over. Except for the morning requirement to escape from the chains she placed you in while you slept it was a perfect rendezvous.
TEXT.Spanish: La seducción de Faeryl es intoxicante. Ella es tan bella como la noche y sus besos solos son suficiente pretexto para una guerra. Excepto por el requisito de la mañana para escapar de las cadenas que os colocó mientras dormíais, fue un encuentro perfecto.

TEXT.English: Even you can't resist feeling intimidated as Hannah brings her warship alongside your galleon. But her offer to meet privately has the whole of the Lanun empire wondering about her desires.
TEXT.French: Même vous ne pouvez vous empécher d'être intimidé lorsqu'Hannah amène son vaisseau de guerre à la hauteur de votre gallion. Mais son offre de vous voir en privé fait que la totalité de l'empire Lanun s'intérroge sur ses désirs.
TEXT.German: Nicht einmal Ihr könnt dem Gefühl der Einschüchterung widerstehen, als Hannah ihr Schlachtschiff neben Eurer Galleone andocken lässt. Aber ihr Angebot, Euch privat zu treffen, lässt das gesamte Reich der Lanun über ihre Begehren tuscheln.
TEXT.Italian: Even you can't resist feeling intimidated as Hannah brings her warship alongside your galleon. But her offer to meet privately has the whole of the Lanun empire wondering about her desires.
TEXT.Spanish: Incluso vos no podéis resistir la sensación de intimidación mientras Hannah trae su nave de guerra junto a vuestro galeón. Pero su oferta de encontraros en privado tenía a todo el imperio Lanun preguntándose acerca de sus deseos.

TEXT.English: When you wake in the morning Hannah is already gone. She took one of your hats as a souvenir.
TEXT.French: Lors de votre réveil, Hannah est déjà partie. Elle à pris un de vos chapeaux en souvenir.
TEXT.German: Als Ihr frühmorgens aufwacht, war Hannah bereits über alle Meere. Sie nahm einen Eurer Hüte als Souvenir mit.
TEXT.Italian: When you wake in the morning Hannah is already gone. She took one of your hats as a souvenir.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando despertáis por la mañana Hannah ya se había ido. Se llevó uno de vuestros sombreros como recuerdo.

TEXT.English: The Balseraphs are celebrating for no apparent reason. Keelyn has invited you to join them as a special guest.
TEXT.French: Les Balseraphs font une fête sans raison apparente. Keelyn vous a invité à se joindre à eux.
TEXT.German: Die Balseraph feiern ohne jeglichen Grund. Keelyn lädt Euch als besonderen Gast zu ihrem Fest ein.
TEXT.Italian: The Balseraphs are celebrating for no apparent reason. Keelyn has invited you to join them as a special guest.
TEXT.Spanish: Los Balseraphs estan de fiesta sin razón aparente. Keelyn os ha invitado a uniros a ellos como invitado especial.

TEXT.English: You have little memory of your night among the Balseraphs. Back at your ship you drink to nurse a pounding headache and are surprised to find that someone has painted your block and tackle bright white, red and yellow.
TEXT.French: vous n'avez que peu de souvenirs de votre nuit parmi les Balseraphs. De retour à votre vaisseau, vous buvez pour soigner un mal de tête fracassant et êtes surpris de découvrir que quelqu'un à peint vos cordages en rouge, blanc et jaune.
TEXT.German: Ihr erinnert Euch nur noch schwach, an die Nacht inmitten der Balseraph. Zurück auf Eurem Schiff, trinkt Ihr etwas, um Euren Kater zu pflegen. Als Ihr das Heck und die Takelage betrachtet, seid Ihr verblüfft, dass sie jemand in hellem Weiss, Rot und Gelb angestrichen hat.
TEXT.Italian: You have little memory of your night among the Balseraphs. Back at your ship you drink to nurse a pounding headache and are surprised to find that someone has painted your block and tackle bright white, red and yellow.
TEXT.Spanish: Tenéis poca memoria acerca de vuestra noche entre los Balseraphs. De vuelta en vuestro barco, bebéis para calmar un dolor de cabeza punzante y os sorprendéis de encontrar que alguien ha pintado vuestra ropa de blanco, rojo y amarillo.

TEXT.English: Deep within the Doviello lands Mahala celebrates the first snow with a bonfire and brutal contests between her subjects. You are invited to attend.
TEXT.French: Au plus profond des terres doviellonnes, Mahala célèbre la première neige avec un bon feu et des concours brutaux entre ses sujets. Vous êtes invité à y assister.
TEXT.German: Tief im Lande der Doviello, feiert Mahala den ersten Schneefall mit einem Freudenfeuer und brutalen Wettkämpfen zwischen ihren Untergebenen. Ihr wurdet gebeten daran teilzunehmen.
TEXT.Italian: Deep within the Doviello lands Mahala celebrates the first snow with a bonfire and brutal contests between her subjects. You are invited to attend.
TEXT.Spanish: En las profundidades de las tierras Doviello, Mahala celebra la primera nevada con una hoguera y una competición brutal entre sus subordinados. Vos estáis invitado para asistir.

TEXT.English: Mahala is the opposite of her people and you are surprised to find a beautiful woman beneath the war paint and furs. When they are rough she is soft, where they are demanding she is yielding, while their lands are cold her bed is very warm.
TEXT.French: Mahala est l'opposé de son peuple et vous êtes surpris de trouver une très belle femme sous les peintures de guerres et les fourrures. La où ils sont durs, elle est douce, lorsqu'ils exigent , elle cède, et tandis que ses terres sont froides , son lit est très chaud.
TEXT.German: Mahala ist das Gegenteil ihres Volkes. Ihr wart überrascht, als Ihr unter den Kriegsbemalungen und den Fellen eine wunderschöne Frau fandet. Auch wenn die Doviello grob sind, ist sie weich, wo sie fordernd sind, ist sie nachgiebig, während ihr Land kalt ist, ist ihr Bett sehr warm.
TEXT.Italian: Mahala is the opposite of her people and you are surprised to find a beautiful woman beneath the war paint and furs. When they are rough she is soft, where they are demanding she is yielding, while their lands are cold her bed is very warm.
TEXT.Spanish: Mahala es lo contrario que su pueblo y os sorprendéis de encontrar a una hermosa mujer detrás de sus pinturas de guerra y sus pieles. Donde ellos son rudos, ella es dulce, donde ellos exigen, ella concede, mientras sus tierras son frías, su cama es muy cálida.

TEXT.English: I have no time for such dalliances.
TEXT.French: Je n'ai pas le temps pour de tels enfantillages.
TEXT.German: Ich habe keine Zeit für solche Verzögerungen.
TEXT.Italian: I have no time for such dalliances.
TEXT.Spanish: No tengo tiempo para tales retozos.

TEXT.English: Rhoanna requests transport for her and her entourage aboard your flagship.
TEXT.French: Rhoanna demande le transport pour elle et son entourage à bord de votre vaisseau amiral.
TEXT.German: Rhoanna ersucht um eine Passage für sich und ihr Gefolge an Bord Eures Flaggschiffs.
TEXT.Italian: Rhoanna requests transport for her and her entourage aboard your flagship.
TEXT.Spanish: Rhoanna os pide transporte para ella y su séquito a bordo de vuestra nave insignia.

TEXT.English: You find a kindred spirit in the horse maiden and are sorry to see her depart your ship. Are the grasslands of her empire really that different than the rolling seas you call home?
TEXT.French: Vous trouvez un esprit familier à la vierge aux chevaux et êtes désolé de la voir partir de votre vaisseau. Les étendues de prairie de son empire sont-elles vraiment si différentes que les mers mouvantes que vous appelez votre demeure?
TEXT.German: Ihr entdeckt eine verwandte Seele in der Pferdejungfer und es betrübt Euch zu sehen, wie sie Euer Schiff verlässt. Sind all die Weideländer ihres Reiches wirklich so verschieden von der wogende See, die Ihr Eure Heimat nennt?
TEXT.Italian: You find a kindred spirit in the horse maiden and are sorry to see her depart your ship. Are the grasslands of her empire really that different than the rolling seas you call home?
TEXT.Spanish: Encontráis un espíritu familiar en la doncella jinete y lamentáis verla salir en vuestra nave. ¿Acaso son las tierras agrestes de su imperio tan diferentes de los ondulados mares a los que llamáis hogar?

TEXT.English: The Clan of Embers celebrate the fall of Bhall by lighting bonfires across their empire. Sheelba, who stands nearly a foot taller than you and is easily twice as strong, invites you to share their celebration and a night hunting with her.
TEXT.French: Le Clan des Braises célèbre la chute de Bhall en allumant des feux de joie à travers leur empire. Sheelba, qui mesure près d'une tête de plus que vous et qui est facilement deux fois plus forte, vous invite à partager les célébrations et une nuit de chasse avec elle.
TEXT.German: Der Aschenklan feiert den Untergang der Göttin Bhall durch leuchtende Freudenfeuer im ganzen Reich. Sheelba, die Euch um fast einen Fuss überragt und leicht doppelt so stark ist, lädt Euch ein, ihrem Fest beizuwohnen und an einer gemeinsamen Nachtjagd teilzunehmen.
TEXT.Italian: The Clan of Embers celebrate the fall of Bhall by lighting bonfires across their empire. Sheelba, who stands nearly a foot taller than you and is easily twice as strong, invites you to share their celebration and a night hunting with her.
TEXT.Spanish: El Clan de las Ascuas celebra la caída de Bhall con hogueras luminosas por todo su imperio. Sheelba, que se mantenía de pie aproximadamente un pie más alta que vos, y seguramente es el doble de fuerte, os invita a compartir su celebración y una noche de caza con ella.

TEXT.English: Have you no standards?
TEXT.French: N'avez-vous aucune norme?
TEXT.German: Habt Ihr keine anderen Maßstäbe?
TEXT.Italian: Have you no standards?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Es que no tenéis preceptos?

TEXT.English: Thessa enters your lands to barter for the Ljosalfar. She asks for a personal tour of your ship.
TEXT.French: Thessa entre sur vos terres pour troquer pour les Ljosalfars. Elle demande une visite privée de votre vaisseau.
TEXT.German: Thessa betritt Eure Ländereien, um Tauschhandel für die Ljosalfar zu betreiben. Sie fragt nach einem persönlichen Rundgang auf Eurem Schiff.
TEXT.Italian: Thessa enters your lands to barter for the Ljosalfar. She asks for a personal tour of your ship.
TEXT.Spanish: Thessa entra en vuestras tierras para intercambiar por los Ljosalfar. Os pide una visita personal de vuestra nave.

TEXT.English: You had heard rumors that Thessa killed her husband on his wedding night. From her intensity you suspect he died in more active pursuits than as an arcane sacrifice. Fortunately you survived the night better than he did.
TEXT.French: Vous aviez entendu des rumeurs disant que Thessa avait tué son mari la nuit de leur mariage. D'après ses aptitudes , vous suspectez qu'il est plutôt mort de ses poursuites assidues que d'un quelqu'onque sacrifine magique. Heureusement, vous avez survécu à la nuit d'une meilleure manière que lui.
TEXT.German: Ihr hattet von Gerüchten gehört, dass Thessa ihren Ehemann in der Hochzeitsnacht getötet hätte. Wegen ihrer ungestümen Heftigkeit vermutet Ihr, dass er wohl eher an den Aktivitätem als an einer geheimnisvollen Opferung gestorben ist. Glücklicherweise habt Ihr diese Nacht besser überlebt, als er es tat.
TEXT.Italian: You had heard rumors that Thessa killed her husband on his wedding night. From her intensity you suspect he died in more active pursuits than as an arcane sacrifice. Fortunately you survived the night better than he did.
TEXT.Spanish: Habíais oído rumores de que Thessa asesinó a su marido en su noche de bodas. Por su intensidad sospecháis que murió por ocupaciones más activas que por un sacrificio arcano. Afortunadamente sobrevivísteis a la noche mejor que de lo que lo hizo él.

TEXT.English: The harsh queen of the Amurites is direct about her desires. She has heard about your talents and invites you to her palace so she may judge them herself.
TEXT.French: La dure reine des Amurites est directe à propos de ses désirs. Elle a entendu parler de vos talents et vous invite en son palais pour qu'elle puisse les juger elle-même.
TEXT.German: Die schroffe Königin der Amuriten ist direkt, was ihre Begehren betrifft. Sie hat von Euren Begabungen gehört und lädt Euch in ihren Palast ein, um sich selbst ein Bild zu machen.
TEXT.Italian: The harsh queen of the Amurites is direct about her desires. She has heard about your talents and invites you to her palace so she may judge them herself.
TEXT.Spanish: La severa reina de los Amurites es directa acerca de sus deseos. Escuchó acerca de vuestros talentos y os invitó a su palacio para que pudiera juzgar por sí misma.

TEXT.English: You promise yourself that you will stay away from sorceresses for a while. At one point you would have sworn she transformed into a very affectionate earth elemental.
TEXT.French: Vous vous prométez que vous resterez loin de la sorcière pendant un certain temps. A un moment , vous auriez juré qu'elle s'était transformée en un élémental de terre très affectueux.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt Euch selbst versprochen, dass Ihr für eine Weile der Gesellschaft von Zauberinnen fernbleibt. Einmal hättet Ihr schwören können, dass sie sich in einen sehr zärtlichen Erdelementar verwandelt hat.
TEXT.Italian: You promise yourself that you will stay away from sorceresses for a while. At one point you would have sworn she transformed into a very affectionate earth elemental.
TEXT.Spanish: Os prometéis a vos mismo que os alejaréis de los hechiceros por un tiempo. En cierto momento habríais jurado que ella os transformó en un elemental de tierra muy cariñoso.

TEXT.English: A gruesome murder has occurred in %s2_city. The town watch found a poor street woman with her throat slit. A killer is loose in the city.
TEXT.French: A gruesome murder has occurred in %s2_city. The town watch found a poor street woman with her throat slit. A killer is loose in the city.
TEXT.German: Ein grausamer Mord ist in %s2_city geschehen. Die Stadtwache hat eine arme Bettlerin gefunden, deren Kehle durchgeschnitten wurde. Ein Mörder treibt in der Stadt sein Unwesen.
TEXT.Italian: A gruesome murder has occurred in %s2_city. The town watch found a poor street woman with her throat slit. A killer is loose in the city.
TEXT.Spanish: A gruesome murder has occurred in %s2_city. The town watch found a poor street woman with her throat slit. A killer is loose in the city.

TEXT.English: Do nothing.
TEXT.French: Do nothing.
TEXT.German: Tut nichts.
TEXT.Italian: Do nothing.
TEXT.Spanish: Do nothing.

TEXT.English: Order the watch to step up patrols.
TEXT.French: Order the watch to step up patrols.
TEXT.German: Befehlt der Wache, ihre Patrouillen auszuweiten.
TEXT.Italian: Order the watch to step up patrols.
TEXT.Spanish: Order the watch to step up patrols.

TEXT.English: Pay the assassins' guild to make sure this madman's rampage is ended.
TEXT.French: Pay the assassins' guild to make sure this madman's rampage is ended.
TEXT.German: Heuert Aerons Finstere Gabe an, um sicherzustellen, dass dem Amoklauf dieses Verrückten ein Ende gesetzt wird.
TEXT.Italian: Pay the assassins' guild to make sure this madman's rampage is ended.
TEXT.Spanish: Pay the assassins' guild to make sure this madman's rampage is ended.

TEXT.English: The serial killer has finally been caught in %s2_city. He is a dangerous, deeply disturbed man. It took a dozen guards to subdue him.
TEXT.French: The serial killer has finally been caught in %s2_city. He is a dangerous, deeply disturbed man. It took a dozen guards to subdue him.
TEXT.German: Der Serienmörder wurde endlich in %s2_city verhaftet. Er ist ein gefährlicher, stark gestörter Mann. Es brauchte ein Dutzend Wachen, um ihn zu überwältigen.
TEXT.Italian: The serial killer has finally been caught in %s2_city. He is a dangerous, deeply disturbed man. It took a dozen guards to subdue him.
TEXT.Spanish: The serial killer has finally been caught in %s2_city. He is a dangerous, deeply disturbed man. It took a dozen guards to subdue him.

TEXT.English: Good. Make his execution swift and immediate.
TEXT.French: Good. Make his execution swift and immediate.
TEXT.German: Gut. Exekutiert ihn schnell und unverzüglich.
TEXT.Italian: Good. Make his execution swift and immediate.
TEXT.Spanish: Good. Make his execution swift and immediate.

TEXT.English: Torture him publicly before his execution.
TEXT.French: Torture him publicly before his execution.
TEXT.German: Foltert ihn vor seiner Hinrichtung öffentlich.
TEXT.Italian: Torture him publicly before his execution.
TEXT.Spanish: Torture him publicly before his execution.

TEXT.English: We need every swordarm we can get, enlist him.
TEXT.French: We need every swordarm we can get, enlist him.
TEXT.German: Wir benötigen jedes Schwert, dass wir bekommen können. Verpflichtet ihn.
TEXT.Italian: We need every swordarm we can get, enlist him.
TEXT.Spanish: We need every swordarm we can get, enlist him.

TEXT.English: Give him to the keepers of the Asylum until he can better repay his debt.
TEXT.French: Give him to the keepers of the Asylum until he can better repay his debt.
TEXT.German: Übergebt ihn den Wärtern der Versuchsanstalt, bis er seine Schuld auf bessere Weise zurückzahlen kann.
TEXT.Italian: Give him to the keepers of the Asylum until he can better repay his debt.
TEXT.Spanish: Give him to the keepers of the Asylum until he can better repay his debt.

TEXT.English: The killer continues his rampage, people flee the city in fear.
TEXT.French: The killer continues his rampage, people flee the city in fear.
TEXT.German: Der Mörder setzt seinen Amoklauf fort. Die Leute fliehen in Panik aus der Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: The killer continues his rampage, people flee the city in fear.
TEXT.Spanish: The killer continues his rampage, people flee the city in fear.

TEXT.English: You hear tales of a cave that is guarded by a creature so foul, so cruel that no man yet has fought with it and lived! Bones of full fifty men lie strewn about its lair. They warn that death awaits you with nasty, big, pointy teeth. When your scouts arrive at the cave they find a small white rabbit.
TEXT.French: You hear tales of a cave that is guarded by a creature so foul, so cruel that no man yet has fought with it and lived! Bones of full fifty men lie strewn about its lair. They warn that death awaits you with nasty, big, pointy teeth. When your scouts arrive at the cave they find a small white rabbit.
TEXT.German: Ihr hört Geschichten über eine Höhle, die von einer solch grausamen Kreatur bewacht wird, dass bisher keiner den Kampf mit ihr überlebt hat. Die Gerippe von fünfzig Männern liegen in ihrem Schlupfwinkel, warnend vor einem Tod durch riesige, bösartige, spitze Fangzähne. Als Eure Späher die Höhle erreichen, finden sie ein kleines weisses Kaninchen vor.
TEXT.Italian: You hear tales of a cave that is guarded by a creature so foul, so cruel that no man yet has fought with it and lived! Bones of full fifty men lie strewn about its lair. They warn that death awaits you with nasty, big, pointy teeth. When your scouts arrive at the cave they find a small white rabbit.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Oís historias de una cueva que está vigilada por una criatura tan repugnante, tan cruel que ningún hombre aún ha luchado contra ella y sobrevivido! Huesos de por lo menos cincuenta hombres yacen esparcidos por su guarida. Os avisan de que la muerte os espera con obscenos, grandes y puntiagudos dientes. Cuando vuestros batidores lleguan a la cueva encuentran un pequeño conejo blanco.

TEXT.English: Go on, Bors. Chop his head off!
TEXT.French: Go on, Bors. Chop his head off!
TEXT.German: Macht weiter, Bors. Hackt ihm den Kopf ab!
TEXT.Italian: Go on, Bors. Chop his head off!
TEXT.Spanish: Adelante, Bors. ¡Córtale la cabeza!

TEXT.English: He's got huge, sharp- eh- he can leap about- look at the bones!
TEXT.French: He's got huge, sharp- eh- he can leap about- look at the bones!
TEXT.German: Es hat große, scharfe... äh... es kann springen... seht die Knochen!
TEXT.Italian: He's got huge, sharp- eh- he can leap about- look at the bones!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Tiene unos enormes, afilados... eh... puede dar brincos... mirad los huesos!

TEXT.English: Let us taunt it! It may become so cross that it will make a mistake.
TEXT.French: Let us taunt it! It may become so cross that it will make a mistake.
TEXT.German: Lasst es uns ärgern! Es könnte so mürrisch werden, dass es einen Fehler macht.
TEXT.Italian: Let us taunt it! It may become so cross that it will make a mistake.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Provoquémosle! Se volverá tan precipitado que cometerá un error.

TEXT.English: Run away! Run away!
TEXT.French: Run away! Run away!
TEXT.German: Lauft davon! Lauft davon!
TEXT.Italian: Run away! Run away!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Corred! ¡Corred!

TEXT.English: The governor of %s2_city rushes into your throne room. Criminals have kidnapped his daughter and are threatening to kill her if a ransom isn't paid. He claims he is unable to pay what they demand.
TEXT.French: The governor of %s2_city rushes into your throne room. Criminals have kidnapped his daughter and are threatening to kill her if a ransom isn't paid. He claims he is unable to pay what they demand.
TEXT.German: Der Bürgermeister der Stadt %s2_city stürmt in Euren Thronsaal. Kriminelle haben seine Tochter entführt und drohen sie zu töten, falls kein Lösegeld gezahlt wird. Er sagt, er sei nicht in der Lage zu zahlen, was sie verlangen.
TEXT.Italian: The governor of %s2_city rushes into your throne room. Criminals have kidnapped his daughter and are threatening to kill her if a ransom isn't paid. He claims he is unable to pay what they demand.
TEXT.Spanish: El gobernador de %s2_city entra a saco en vuestra sala del trono. Unos criminales han raptado a su hija y amenazan con matarla si él no paga el rescate. Asegura que es incapaz de pagar lo que exigen.

TEXT.English: We don't deal with kidnappers
TEXT.French: We don't deal with kidnappers
TEXT.German: Wir verhandeln nicht mit Entführern.
TEXT.Italian: We don't deal with kidnappers
TEXT.Spanish: No negociamos con secuestradores

TEXT.English: Very well, pay the ransom
TEXT.French: Very well, pay the ransom
TEXT.German: Also gut, zahlt das Lösegeld.
TEXT.Italian: Very well, pay the ransom
TEXT.Spanish: Muy bien, pagad el rescate

TEXT.English: It will cost more, but pay adventurers to find and rescue the daughter
TEXT.French: It will cost more, but pay adventurers to find and rescue the daughter
TEXT.German: Es wird mehr kosten, aber heuert Abenteurer an, um die Tochter zu finden und zu retten.
TEXT.Italian: It will cost more, but pay adventurers to find and rescue the daughter
TEXT.Spanish: Costará más, pero pagaremos a unos aventureros para encontrar y rescatar a la hija

TEXT.English: A great sage in the city of %s2_city tires of his endless research and wishes to leave our service.
TEXT.French: A great sage in the city of %s2_city tires of his endless research and wishes to leave our service.
TEXT.German: Ein Großer Forscher in der Stadt %s2_city ist des ewigen Forschens müde und wünscht, aus Euren Diensten entlassen zu werden.
TEXT.Italian: A great sage in the city of %s2_city tires of his endless research and wishes to leave our service.
TEXT.Spanish: n gran científico en la ciudad de %s2_city se ha cansado de su interminable investigación y pretende abandonar el servicio.

TEXT.English: Thank him for his service.
TEXT.French: Thank him for his service.
TEXT.German: Dankt ihm für seine Dienste.
TEXT.Italian: Thank him for his service.
TEXT.Spanish: Le daré las gracias por sus servicios.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Sage[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is retired
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Sage[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is retired
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Sage[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is retired
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Sage[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is retired
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Sage[COLOR_REVERT] from %s1_city is retired

TEXT.English: Certainly an expensive study will renew his interest.
TEXT.French: Certainly an expensive study will renew his interest.
TEXT.German: Eine teure Studie wird gewiss sein Interesse wieder aufleben lassen.
TEXT.Italian: Certainly an expensive study will renew his interest.
TEXT.Spanish: Ciertamente un estudio caro renovará su interés.

TEXT.English: Grant him a prestigious position as curator of the library.
TEXT.French: Grant him a prestigious position as curator of the library.
TEXT.German: Gewährt ihm eine angesehene Stelle als Kurator der Bibliothek.
TEXT.Italian: Grant him a prestigious position as curator of the library.
TEXT.Spanish: Dadle una posición de prestigio como conservador de la biblioteca.

TEXT.English: Pay to have him trained as an Adept.
TEXT.French: Pay to have him trained as an Adept.
TEXT.German: Bezahlt, um ihn zum Adepten ausbilden zu lassen.
TEXT.Italian: Pay to have him trained as an Adept.
TEXT.Spanish: Paguémosle para tenerlo entrenado como un adepto.

TEXT.English: He knows too much, have him killed.
TEXT.French: He knows too much, have him killed.
TEXT.German: Er weiß zuviel. Lasst ihn töten.
TEXT.Italian: He knows too much, have him killed.
TEXT.Spanish: Sabe demasiado, matadle.

TEXT.English: Searching the remains of the Sailors' Dirge you find a map to an ancient treasure.
TEXT.French: Searching the remains of the Sailors' Dirge you find a map to an ancient treasure.
TEXT.German: Searching the remains of the Sailors' Dirge you find a map to an ancient treasure.
TEXT.Italian: Searching the remains of the Sailors' Dirge you find a map to an ancient treasure.
TEXT.Spanish: Searching the remains of the Sailors' Dirge you find a map to an ancient treasure.

TEXT.English: A young woman offers to setup an apothecary in %s2_city. Shortly after arriving the %s1_civ_adjective ambassador requests your audience. He describes the woman and says she is a criminal that has fled into your lands. He demands that she be turned over to him.
TEXT.French: A young woman offers to setup an apothecary in %s2_city. Shortly after arriving the %s1_civ_adjective ambassador requests your audience. He describes the woman and says she is a criminal that has fled into your lands. He demands that she be turned over to him.
TEXT.German: Eine junge Frau bietet Euch an, eine Kräuterapotheke in der Stadt %s2_city zu errichten. Kurz nach ihrer Ankunft, bittet der %[s1_civ_adjective]e Botschafter um eine Audienz. Er beschreibt jene Frau, sagt, sie sei eine Kriminelle, die in Euer Land geflohen ist, und verlangt ihre Auslieferung.
TEXT.Italian: A young woman offers to setup an apothecary shop in %s2_city. Shortly after arriving the %s1_civ_adjective ambassador requests your audience. He describes the woman and says she is a criminal that has fled into your lands. He demands that she be turned over to him.
TEXT.Spanish: Una joven os ofrece instalar una herboristería en %s2_city. Poco después de llegar, el embajador %s1_civ_adjective pide audiencia con vos. Describe a la mujer y dice que es una criminal que ha huído hasta vuestras tierras. Demanda que ella esté bajo su cargo.

TEXT.English: She sought sanctuary in our lands and we will grant it.
TEXT.French: She sought sanctuary in our lands and we will grant it.
TEXT.German: Sie bat um Asyl bei uns und wir werden es ihr gewähren.
TEXT.Italian: She sought sanctuary in our lands and we will grant it.
TEXT.Spanish: Ella vió asilo en nuestras tierras y se lo daremos.

TEXT.English: I don't know this woman. (lie)
TEXT.French: I don't know this woman. (lie)
TEXT.German: Ich kenne diese Frau nicht. (Lügen)
TEXT.Italian: I don't know this woman. (lie)
TEXT.Spanish: No conozco a esta mujer. (metir)

TEXT.English: She passed through our lands, but she isn't here any longer. (exile her)
TEXT.French: She passed through our lands, but she isn't here any longer. (exile her)
TEXT.German: Sie zog durch unser Land, aber sie ist nicht mehr hier. (sie ins Exil schicken)
TEXT.Italian: She passed through our lands, but she isn't here any longer. (exile her)
TEXT.Spanish: Ha traspasado nuestras tierras, y por eso ya no está aquí. (exiliarla)

TEXT.English: Of course, we will turn her over at once.
TEXT.French: Of course, we will turn her over at once.
TEXT.German: Natürlich, wir werden sie sofort ausliefern.
TEXT.Italian: Of course, we will turn her over at once.
TEXT.Spanish: Por supuesto, la tomaremos a nuestro cargo de inmediato.

TEXT.English: The Sheaim have invited our ritualists to participate in their elegy ritual.
TEXT.French: The Sheaim have invited our ritualists to participate in their elegy ritual.
TEXT.German: Die Sheaïm haben unsere Ritualisten dazu eingeladen, an deren Klageliedritus teilzunehmen.
TEXT.Italian: The Sheaim have invited our ritualists to participate in their elegy ritual.
TEXT.Spanish: Los Sheaim han invitado a nuestros ritualistas a participar en su ritual elegía.

TEXT.English: We would do well to learn from the Sheaim, send them to the ritual.
TEXT.French: We would do well to learn from the Sheaim, send them to the ritual.
TEXT.German: Wir sollten von den Sheaïm lernen. Schickt unsere Leute zum Ritual.
TEXT.Italian: We would do well to learn from the Sheaim, send them to the ritual.
TEXT.Spanish: Haríamos bien en aprender de los Sheaim, enviadlos al ritual.

TEXT.English: What good is our conquest if it is over a world of ashes, ignore their invitation.
TEXT.French: What good is our conquest if it is over a world of ashes, ignore their invitation.
TEXT.German: Was nützen uns unsere Eroberungspläne in einer Welt voller Asche? Ignoriert die Einladung.
