TEXT.Italian: What good is our conquest if it is over a world of ashes, ignore their invitation.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuán buena sería nuestra conquista si es sobre un mundo de cenizas, ignoremos su invitación.

TEXT.English: They are crazy, send agents to disrupt the ritual.
TEXT.French: They are crazy, send agents to disrupt the ritual.
TEXT.German: Sie sind verrückt. Schickt Agenten, um das Ritual zu sabotieren.
TEXT.Italian: They are crazy, send agents to disrupt the ritual.
TEXT.Spanish: Están locos, enviad agentes para desbaratar el ritual.

TEXT.English: Your men have discovered a shrine to Camulos, God of War, hidden in the sewers of %s2_city. What would you like them to do?
TEXT.French: Vos hommes ont découvert un sanctuaire dédié à Camulos Dieu de la Guerre, dissimulé dans les égoûts de %s2_city. Comment doivent-ils procéder ?
TEXT.German: Eure Männer haben, versteckt in der Kanalisation von %s2_city, einen Schrein entdeckt, der Camulos, dem Gott des Krieges, geweiht ist. Was soll mit ihm geschehen?
TEXT.Italian: Your men have discovered a shrine to Camulos, God of War, hidden in the sewers of %s2_city. What would you like them to do?
TEXT.Spanish: Your men have discovered a shrine to Camulos, God of War, hidden in the sewers of %s2_city. What would you like them to do?

TEXT.English: Do nothing, it is best not to anger the gods.
TEXT.French: Ne faites rien ! Mieux vaut éviter de courroucer les Dieux.
TEXT.German: Tut nichts. Es ist besser, die Götter nicht zu verärgern.
TEXT.Italian: Do nothing, it is best not to anger the gods.
TEXT.Spanish: Do nothing, it is best not to anger the gods.

TEXT.English: Order them to destroy the shrine.
TEXT.French: Ordonnez-leur de détruire le sanctuaire.
TEXT.German: Befehlt ihnen, den Schrein zu zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: Order them to destroy the shrine.
TEXT.Spanish: Order them to destroy the shrine.

TEXT.English: Present an offering at the shrine.
TEXT.French: Faites une offrande au sanctuaire.
TEXT.German: Bringt an dem Schrein ein Opfer dar.
TEXT.Italian: Present an offering at the shrine.
TEXT.Spanish: Present an offering at the shrine.

TEXT.English: An unusual wasting disease has spread in the city of %s2_city . The children seem the strongest hit and the healers warn that many may die if nothing is done.
TEXT.French: Une épidémie s'est déclarée à proximité de nos frontières (%s2_city). Les enfants meurent par milliers.
TEXT.German: Eine ungewöhnlich tödliche Seuche hat sich in der Stadt %s2_city ausgebreitet. Die Kinder scheinen am stärksten betroffen und die Heiler warnen, dass viele von ihnen sterben werden, wenn nichts unternommen wird.
TEXT.Italian: An unusual wasting disease has spread in the city of %s2_city . The children seem the strongest hit and the healers warn that many may die if nothing is done.
TEXT.Spanish: An unusual wasting disease has spread in the city of %s2_city . The children seem the strongest hit and the healers warn that many may die if nothing is done.

TEXT.English: We can't do anything.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes impuissants face à cette menace.
TEXT.German: We can't do anything.
TEXT.Italian: We can't do anything.
TEXT.Spanish: Close our borders and declare a national curfew until the threat is away.

TEXT.English: Close our borders and declare a national curfew until the threat is away.
TEXT.French: Fermez les frontières et déclarez un couvre-feu général jusqu'à ce que la menace soit passée.
TEXT.German: Close our borders and declare a national curfew until the threat is away.
TEXT.Italian: Close our borders and declare a national curfew until the threat is away.
TEXT.Spanish: Close our borders and declare a national curfew until the threat is away.

TEXT.English: Send an adept proficient in body magic to strengthen their resistance to the disease.
TEXT.French: Send an adept proficient in body magic to strengthen their resistance to the disease.
TEXT.German: Schickt einen Adepten, der die Körpermagie beherrscht, um ihre Widerstandskraft gegen die Seuche zu stärken.
TEXT.Italian: Send an adept proficient in body magic to strengthen their resistance to the disease.
TEXT.Spanish: Send an adept proficient in body magic to strengthen their resistance to the disease.

TEXT.English: Send an adept proficient in life magic to heal the sick.
TEXT.French: Send an adept proficient in life magic to heal the sick.
TEXT.German: Send an adept proficient in life magic to heal the sick.
TEXT.Italian: Send an adept proficient in life magic to to heal the sick.
TEXT.Spanish: Send an adept proficient in life magic to to heal the sick.

TEXT.English: Freedom from plague makes our superiority very clear to these barbarians. Praise the Emperor!
TEXT.French: Freedom from plague makes our superiority very clear to these barbarians. Praise the Emperor!
TEXT.German: Die Erlösung von allen Plagen verdeutlicht diesen Barbaren unsere überlegenheit. Lobt den Imperator!
TEXT.Italian: Freedom from plague makes our superiority very clear to these barbarians. Praise the Emperor!
TEXT.Spanish: Freedom from plague makes our superiority very clear to these barbarians. Praise the Emperor!

TEXT.English: Immigrants are requesting the Gift to escape these horrors.
TEXT.French: Immigrants are requesting the Gift to escape these horrors.
TEXT.German: Immigrants are requesting the Gift to escape these horrors.
TEXT.Italian: Immigrants are requesting the Gift to escape these horrors.
TEXT.Spanish: Immigrants are requesting the Gift to escape these horrors.

TEXT.English: People fleeing the plague arrived on our lands. Capture them!
TEXT.French: People fleeing the plague arrived on our lands. Capture them!
TEXT.German: People fleeing the plague arrived on our lands. Capture them!
TEXT.Italian: People fleeing the plague arrived on our lands. Capture them!
TEXT.Spanish: People fleeing the plague arrived on our lands. Capture them!

TEXT.English: Let's claim responsibility for the plague. Other countries will fear us even more.
TEXT.French: Let's claim responsibility for the plague. Other countries will fear us even more.
TEXT.German: Let's claim responsibility for the plague. Other countries will fear us even more.
TEXT.Italian: Let's claim responsibility for the plague. Other countries will fear us even more.
TEXT.Spanish: Let's claim responsibility for the plague. Other countries will fear us even more.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]-1 diplomatic relation with all players
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]-1 aux relations diplomatiques avec tous les autres joueurs
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]-1 diplomatic relation with all players
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]-1 diplomatic relation with all players
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]-1 diplomatic relation with all players

TEXT.English: A disease of this magnitude can't be natural. Find the genius behind this plague and hire him.
TEXT.French: A disease of this magnitude can't be natural. Find the genius behind this plague and hire him.
TEXT.German: A disease of this magnitude can't be natural. Find the genius behind this plague and hire him.
TEXT.Italian: A disease of this magnitude can't be natural. Find the genius behind this plague and hire him.
TEXT.Spanish: A disease of this magnitude can't be natural. Find the genius behind this plague and hire him.

TEXT.English: Acknowledge
TEXT.French: Confirmer
TEXT.German: Anerkennen
TEXT.Italian: Acknowledge
TEXT.Spanish: Acknowledge

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Obsidian Scepter has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Aeron and your prophets warn that children born during this time are more likely to be powerful leaders or psychopaths.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Obsidian Scepter has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Aeron and your prophets warn that children born during this time are more likely to be powerful leaders or psychopaths.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass das Obsidianzepter den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Aeron geweiht und Eure Propheten warnen, dass die während dieser Zeit geborenen Kinder mit größerer Wahrscheinlichkeit zu mächtigen Anführern oder Psychopathen reifen können.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Obsidian Scepter has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Aeron and your prophets warn that children born during this time are more likely to be powerful leaders or psychopaths.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Obsidian Scepter has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Aeron and your prophets warn that children born during this time are more likely to be powerful leaders or psychopaths.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Great Serpent has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Agares and the sign bodes poorly for goodly nations.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Great Serpent has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Agares and the sign bodes poorly for goodly nations.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass die Große Schlange den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Agares geweiht und verheißt nichts gutes für große Nationen.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Great Serpent has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Agares and the sign bodes poorly for goodly nations.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Great Serpent has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Agares and the sign bodes poorly for goodly nations.

TEXT.English: If the King of Hope moves upon Erebus we should honor him. Perform blood rituals in each of our cities.
TEXT.French: If the King of Hope moves upon Erebus we should honor him. Perform blood rituals in each of our cities.
TEXT.German: Wenn der König der Hoffnung über Erebus hinweg zieht, sollten wir ihn ehren. Lasst Blutrituale in all unseren Städten stattfinden.
TEXT.Italian: If the King of Hope moves upon Erebus we should honor him. Perform blood rituals in each of our cities.
TEXT.Spanish: If the King of Hope moves upon Erebus we should honor him. Perform blood rituals in each of our cities.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Bow has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Amathaon and your governors report an increase in their cities' birth rates.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Bow has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Amathaon and your governors report an increase in their cities' birth rates.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass der Bogen den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Amathaon geweiht und Eure Bügermeister berichten von einer erhöhten Geburtenrate in ihren Städten.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Bow has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Amathaon and your governors report an increase in their cities' birth rates.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Bow has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Amathaon and your governors report an increase in their cities' birth rates.

TEXT.English: I am sure Amathaon signals the birth of a gifted child. Where better to be born than among our people, ask our governors to search for a child that bears Amathaon's mark.
TEXT.French: I am sure Amathaon signals the birth of a gifted child. Where better to be born than among our people, ask our governors to search for a child that bears Amathaon's mark.
TEXT.German: Sicherlich ist das Amathaons Zeichen für die Geburt eines außergewöhnlichen Kindes. Welches Volk wäre dafür besser geeignet als unseres. Lasst die Bürgermeister nach einem Kind suchen, das Amathaons Mal trägt.
TEXT.Italian: I am sure Amathaon signals the birth of a gifted child. Where better to be born than among our people, ask our governors to search for a child that bears Amathaon's mark.
TEXT.Spanish: I am sure Amathaon signals the birth of a gifted child. Where better to be born than among our people, ask our governors to search for a child that bears Amathaon's mark.

TEXT.English: Pray that Amathaon inspires our researchers to greater heights of knowledge.
TEXT.French: Pray that Amathaon inspires our researchers to greater heights of knowledge.
TEXT.German: Betet, damit Amathaon unsere Gelehrten zu den höheren Sphären des Wissens führt.
TEXT.Italian: Pray that Amathaon inspires our researchers to greater heights of knowledge.
TEXT.Spanish: Pray that Amathaon inspires our researchers to greater heights of knowledge.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Shroud has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Arawn and it is said to be a good time to visit gravesites and remember those that have passed on.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Shroud has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Arawn and it is said to be a good time to visit gravesites and remember those that have passed on.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass das Leichentuch den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Arawn geweiht und es heißt, dass dies eine gute Zeit sei, um Grabstätten zu besuchen und den Verblichenen zu gedenken.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Shroud has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Arawn and it is said to be a good time to visit gravesites and remember those that have passed on.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Shroud has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Arawn and it is said to be a good time to visit gravesites and remember those that have passed on.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Burnt Wings has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Bhall and your prophets predict it signals the coming of long dry summer.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Burnt Wings has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Bhall and your prophets predict it signals the coming of long dry summer.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass die Verbrannten Flügel den Nachthimmel beherrschen. Dieses Sternbild ist Bhall geweiht und Eure Propheten deuten es als Zeichen für einen langen, trockenen Sommer.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Burnt Wings has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Bhall and your prophets predict it signals the coming of long dry summer.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Burnt Wings has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Bhall and your prophets predict it signals the coming of long dry summer.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Blazing Sword has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Camulos and your prophets warn against attempting diplomacy during this period.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Blazing Sword has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Camulos and your prophets warn against attempting diplomacy during this period.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass das Lodernde Schwert den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Camulos geweiht und Eure Propheten warnen davor, während dieser Zeit diplomatische Kontakte aufzunehmen.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Blazing Sword has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Camulos and your prophets warn against attempting diplomacy during this period.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Blazing Sword has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Camulos and your prophets warn against attempting diplomacy during this period.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Black Candle has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Ceridwen and your people report a period of strange dreams and visions.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Black Candle has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Ceridwen and your people report a period of strange dreams and visions.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass die Schwarze Kerze den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Ceridwen geweiht und Eurem Volk steht eine Zeit voll seltsamer Träume und Visionen bevor.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Black Candle has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Ceridwen and your people report a period of strange dreams and visions.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Black Candle has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Ceridwen and your people report a period of strange dreams and visions.

TEXT.English: These dreams must lead to someone favored by the Queen of Pain. Make sacrifices to Ceridwen that we might be able to follow her message.
TEXT.French: These dreams must lead to someone favored by the Queen of Pain. Make sacrifices to Ceridwen that we might be able to follow her message.
TEXT.German: Diese Träume müssen zu jemandem führen, der über die Gunst der Königin der Schmerzen verfügt. Bringt Opfergaben an Ceridwen dar, damit wir ihrer Botschaft Folge leisten können.
TEXT.Italian: These dreams must lead to someone favored by the Queen of Pain. Make sacrifices to Ceridwen that we might be able to follow her message.
TEXT.Spanish: These dreams must lead to someone favored by the Queen of Pain. Make sacrifices to Ceridwen that we might be able to follow her message.

TEXT.English: Have our researchers pray to Ceridwen so that they may benefit from her knowledge.
TEXT.French: Have our researchers pray to Ceridwen so that they may benefit from her knowledge.
TEXT.German: Lasst unsere Gelehrten beten, damit sie vielleicht von Ceridwens Wissen profitieren können.
TEXT.Italian: Have our researchers pray to Ceridwen so that they may benefit from her knowledge.
TEXT.Spanish: Have our researchers pray to Ceridwen so that they may benefit from her knowledge.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Great Tree has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Cernunnos and scouts report animals are more common and aggressive than normal.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Great Tree has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Cernunnos and scouts report animals are more common and aggressive than normal.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass der Große Baum den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Cernunnos geweiht und Späher berichten, dass Tiere häufiger ihre Unterschlüpfe verlassen und sich aggressiver verhalten als normalerweise.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Great Tree has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Cernunnos and scouts report animals are more common and aggressive than normal.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Great Tree has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Cernunnos and scouts report animals are more common and aggressive than normal.

TEXT.English: That is good. Hold a grand feast in each of our cities.
TEXT.French: That is good. Hold a grand feast in each of our cities.
TEXT.German: Das ist gut. Veranstaltet in jeder unserer Städte ein großes Fest.
TEXT.Italian: That is good. Hold a grand feast in each of our cities.
TEXT.Spanish: That is good. Hold a grand feast in each of our cities.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Scales has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Dagda and signals a good period to make agreements and sign treaties.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Scales has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Dagda and signals a good period to make agreements and sign treaties.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass die Waage den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Dagda geweiht und verheißt eine gute Zeit für Verhandlungen und die Unterzeichnung von Verträgen und Abkommen.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Scales has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Dagda and signals a good period to make agreements and sign treaties.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Scales has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Dagda and signals a good period to make agreements and sign treaties.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Silver Tears has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Danalin. Your harbormasters report increased catches from fishing fleets and your governors report an increase in suicides.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Silver Tears has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Danalin. Your harbormasters report increased catches from fishing fleets and your governors report an increase in suicides.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass die Silbernen Tränen den Nachthimmel beherrschen. Dieses Sternbild ist Danalin geweiht und während Eure Hafenmeister von erhöhten Fängen Eurer Fischereiflotte berichten, vermelden Eure Bürgermeister vermehrt Selbstmorde.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Silver Tears has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Danalin. Your harbormasters report increased catches from fishing fleets and your governors report an increase in suicides.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Silver Tears has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Danalin. Your harbormasters report increased catches from fishing fleets and your governors report an increase in suicides.

TEXT.English: Hold festivals in the cities and allow the wine and oblivio to flow freely.
TEXT.French: Hold festivals in the cities and allow the wine and oblivio to flow freely.
TEXT.German: Veranstaltet Festivitäten in den Städten und lasst den Wein und das Vergessen ungehindert durch die Herzen der Leute fließen.
TEXT.Italian: Hold festivals in the cities and allow the wine and oblivio to flow freely.
TEXT.Spanish: Hold festivals in the cities and allow the wine and oblivio to flow freely.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Jeweled Mask has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Esus and your watch commanders report increased criminal behavior after its display.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Jeweled Mask has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Esus and your watch commanders report increased criminal behavior after its display.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass die Juwelenmaske den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Esus geweiht und die Kommandeure Eurer Wachen berichten von vermehrt auftretendem kriminellen Verhalten.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Jeweled Mask has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Esus and your watch commanders report increased criminal behavior after its display.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Jeweled Mask has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Esus and your watch commanders report increased criminal behavior after its display.

TEXT.English: Certainly our people will delight in this sign.
TEXT.French: Certainly our people will delight in this sign.
TEXT.German: Sicherlich wird unser Volk mit Entzücken auf dieses Zeichen reagieren.
TEXT.Italian: Certainly our people will delight in this sign.
TEXT.Spanish: Certainly our people will delight in this sign.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Shield of Valor has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Junil and marks a rise in his power within the world.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Shield of Valor has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Junil and marks a rise in his power within the world.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass das Schild des Mutes den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Junil geweiht und verkündet eine Stärkung seiner Macht in dieser Welt.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Shield of Valor has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Junil and marks a rise in his power within the world.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Shield of Valor has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Junil and marks a rise in his power within the world.

TEXT.English: This is an auspicious time indeed, have our garrisons form parades through the cities in Junil's honor.
TEXT.French: This is an auspicious time indeed, have our garrisons form parades through the cities in Junil's honor.
TEXT.German: Dies sind wohl vielversprechende Zeiten. Lasst unsere Garnisonen in den Städten Paraden zu Junils Ehren abhalten.
TEXT.Italian: This is an auspicious time indeed, have our garrisons form parades through the cities in Junil's honor.
TEXT.Spanish: This is an auspicious time indeed, have our garrisons form parades through the cities in Junil's honor.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Sleeping Dragon has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Kilmorph and your governors report an increase in mine production.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Sleeping Dragon has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Kilmorph and your governors report an increase in mine production.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass der Schlafende Drache den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Kilmorph geweiht und Eure Bürgermeister berichten von einer erhöhten Ausbeute bei den Minen.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Sleeping Dragon has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Kilmorph and your governors report an increase in mine production.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Sleeping Dragon has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Kilmorph and your governors report an increase in mine production.

TEXT.English: Hold ceremonies in the temples. But don't spend too much.
TEXT.French: Hold ceremonies in the temples. But don't spend too much.
TEXT.German: Haltet Zeremonien in den Tempeln ab. Aber verschwendet nicht zu viel Zeit darauf.
TEXT.Italian: Hold ceremonies in the temples. But don't spend too much.
TEXT.Spanish: Hold ceremonies in the temples. But don't spend too much.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Night Sun has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Lugus and is so bright that some nights are almost as bright as day. Criminals' activities are hampered by the light.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Night Sun has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Lugus and is so bright that some nights are almost as bright as day. Criminals' activities are hampered by the light.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass die Nachtsonne den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Lugus geweiht und ist so strahlend, dass manche Nächte taghell sind, wodurch Kriminelle an der Ausübung ihrer Tätigkeiten gehindert werden.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Night Sun has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Lugus and is so bright that some nights are almost as bright as day. Criminals' activities are hampered by the light.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Night Sun has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Lugus and is so bright that some nights are almost as bright as day. Criminals' activities are hampered by the light.

TEXT.English: Open the council halls to the people. All should witness and be enlightened by this event.
TEXT.French: Open the council halls to the people. All should witness and be enlightened by this event.
TEXT.German: Öffnet die Ratssäle für das Volk. Alle sollen Zeuge dieses Ereignisses und zugleich von ihm erleuchtet werden.
TEXT.Italian: Open the council halls to the people. All should witness and be enlightened by this event.
TEXT.Spanish: Open the council halls to the people. All should witness and be enlightened by this event.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Coin has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Mammon and your governors report an increase in commerce and crime during this period.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Coin has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Mammon and your governors report an increase in commerce and crime during this period.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass die Münze den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Mammon geweiht und Eure Bürgermeister berichten von erhöhtem Handel und mehr Verbrechen in ihren Städten.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Coin has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Mammon and your governors report an increase in commerce and crime during this period.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Coin has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Mammon and your governors report an increase in commerce and crime during this period.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Bear has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Mulcarn and some say it signals the coming of a fierce winter.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Bear has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Mulcarn and some say it signals the coming of a fierce winter.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass der Bär den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Mulcarn geweiht und einige sagen, dass es die Ankunft eines strengen Winters vorhersagt.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Bear has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Mulcarn and some say it signals the coming of a fierce winter.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Bear has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Mulcarn and some say it signals the coming of a fierce winter.

TEXT.English: This is the sign of the return of our glory.
TEXT.French: This is the sign of the return of our glory.
TEXT.German: Dies ist das Zeichen für unseren erneuten Aufstieg zu Macht und Ruhm.
TEXT.Italian: This is the sign of the return of our glory.
TEXT.Spanish: This is the sign of the return of our glory.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Eye of Heaven has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Nantosuelta and most believe it signals an auspicious time to plan marriages.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Eye of Heaven has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Nantosuelta and most believe it signals an auspicious time to plan marriages.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass das Auge des Himmels den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Nantosuelta geweiht und viele glauben, dass eine glückliche Zeit für Hochzeiten vorhersagt.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Eye of Heaven has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Nantosuelta and most believe it signals an auspicious time to plan marriages.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Eye of Heaven has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Nantosuelta and most believe it signals an auspicious time to plan marriages.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Open Tome has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Oghma and your researchers make significant progress during this period.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Open Tome has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Oghma and your researchers make significant progress during this period.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass das Aufgeschlagene Buch den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Oghma geweiht und Eure Gelehrten erzielen deutliche Fortschritte während dieser Zeit.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Open Tome has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Oghma and your researchers make significant progress during this period.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Open Tome has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Oghma and your researchers make significant progress during this period.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Bronze Owl has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Sirona and your prophets predict that it signals a coming period of peace and happiness.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Bronze Owl has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Sirona and your prophets predict that it signals a coming period of peace and happiness.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass die Bronzene Eule den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Sirona geweiht und Eure Propheten deuten es als Zeichen für die Ankunft einer Zeit des Friedens und der Freude.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Bronze Owl has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Sirona and your prophets predict that it signals a coming period of peace and happiness.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Bronze Owl has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Sirona and your prophets predict that it signals a coming period of peace and happiness.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Arms of God has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Sucellus and your healers report sudden, and often miraculous, recovery from diseases among your people.
TEXT.French: Les astrologues signalent que les bras de Dieux sont en vue dans le ciel. Cette constellation est sacrée pour Sucellus et vos guérisseurs rapportent des guérisons soudaines et souvent miraculeuses parmi votre peuple.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass die Arme Gottes den Nachthimmel beherrschen. Dieses Sternbild ist Sucellus geweiht und Eure Heiler berichten von einigen Eurer Untertanen, die plötzlich und auf oftmals wundersame Weise von Krankheiten genesen.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Arms of God has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Sucellus and your healers report sudden, and often miraculous, recovery from diseases among your people.
TEXT.Spanish: Astrologers report that the Arms of God has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Sucellus and your healers report sudden, and often miraculous, recovery from diseases among your people.

TEXT.English: Astrologers report that the Pegasus has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Tali and strong storms rage across your lands. All wildfires have been extinguished.
TEXT.French: Astrologers report that the Pegasus has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Tali and strong storms rage across your lands. All wildfires have been extinguished.
TEXT.German: Eure Sterndeuter berichten, dass der Pegasus den Nachthimmel beherrscht. Dieses Sternbild ist Tali geweiht und lässt mächtige Stürme über Eurem Land wüten. All wildfires have been extinguished.
TEXT.Italian: Astrologers report that the Pegasus has moved into prominence. This constellation is sacred to Tali and strong storms rage across your lands. All wildfires have been extinguished.
TEXT.Spanish: Los Astrólogos avisan de que el Pegaso ha entrado en prominencia. Esta constelación es sagrada para Tali y fuertes tormentas cruzan vuestras tierras. All wildfires have been extinguished.

TEXT.English: Event : A slave has escaped from your lands.
TEXT.French: Un esclave s'est echappé de vos terres.
TEXT.German: Ein Sklave ist aus Eurem Reich geflohen.
TEXT.Italian: A slave has escaped from your lands.
TEXT.Spanish: Un esclavo ha escapado de vuestras tierras.

TEXT.English: An angry slave has taken up arms against you.
TEXT.French: Un esclave énervé a pris les armes contre vous.
TEXT.German: Ein unzufriedener Sklave erhebt die Waffen gegen Euch.
TEXT.Italian: An angry slave has taken up arms against you.
TEXT.Spanish: Un esclavo enfadado se ha levantado en armas contra vos.

TEXT.English: The captain finds an illegal slave ring within the city. The male slaves were forced to fight in underground tournaments, the women suffered far worse. The captain requests your permission to execute the traders and free the slaves.
TEXT.French: The captain finds an illegal slave ring within the city. The male slaves were forced to fight in underground tournaments, the women suffered far worse. The captain requests your permission to execute the traders and free the slaves.
TEXT.German: Der Hauptmann der Wache hat einen illegalen Sklavenhändlerring in der Stadt ausgehoben. Die männlichen Sklaven wurden gezwungen, in unterirdischen Arenen gegeneinander zu kämpfen, während es den Frauen weit schlimmer erging. Der Hauptmann erbittet Eure Erlaubnis, die Sklavenhändler zu exekutieren und die Sklaven zu befreien.
TEXT.Italian: The captain finds an illegal slave ring within the city. The male slaves were forced to fight in underground tournaments, the women suffered far worse. The captain requests your permission to execute the traders and free the slaves.
TEXT.Spanish: The captain finds an illegal slave ring within the city. The male slaves were forced to fight in underground tournaments, the women suffered far worse. The captain requests your permission to execute the traders and free the slaves.

TEXT.English: Congratulate the captain on his work and approve his request.
TEXT.French: Congratulate the captain on his work and approve his request.
TEXT.German: Gratuliert dem Hauptmann für seine gute Arbeit und genehmigt seine Bitte.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulate the captain on his work and approve his request.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulate the captain on his work and approve his request.

TEXT.English: That seems like a waste of perfectly good slaves...
TEXT.French: That seems like a waste of perfectly good slaves...
TEXT.German: Das scheint mir eine Verschwendung von völlig gesunden Sklaven zu sein...
TEXT.Italian: That seems like a waste of perfectly good slaves...
TEXT.Spanish: That seems like a waste of perfectly good slaves...

TEXT.English: The guard captain of %s2_city suspects that there is an illegal slave ring operating in the city and requests additional funds to track them down.
TEXT.French: The guard captain of %s2_city suspects that there is an illegal slave ring operating in the city and requests additional funds to track them down.
TEXT.German: Der Hauptmann der Wache in %s2_city vermutet, dass in seiner Stadt ein illegaler Sklavenhändlerring agiert und verlangt zusätzliche Mittel, um ihn aufzuspüren.
TEXT.Italian: The guard captain of %s2_city suspects that there is an illegal slave ring operating in the city and requests additional funds to track them down.
TEXT.Spanish: The guard captain of %s2_city suspects that there is an illegal slave ring operating in the city and requests additional funds to track them down.

TEXT.English: Give him what he needs.
TEXT.French: Give him what he needs.
TEXT.German: Gebt ihm, was er benötigt.
TEXT.Italian: Give him what he needs.
TEXT.Spanish: Give him what he needs.

TEXT.English: There are more important things to focus on.
TEXT.French: There are more important things to focus on.
TEXT.German: Es gibt wichtigere Angelegenheiten, auf die es sich zu konzentrieren gilt.
TEXT.Italian: There are more important things to focus on.
TEXT.Spanish: There are more important things to focus on.

TEXT.English: The guard captain of %s2_city reports growing smuggling activity and wants to know how to proceed.
TEXT.French: The guard captain of %s2_city reports growing smuggling activity and wants to know how to proceed.
TEXT.German: Der Hauptmann der Stadtwache in %s2_city meldet zunehmende Schmuggleraktivitäten und möchte wissen, wie er weiter verfahren soll.
TEXT.Italian: The guard captain of %s2_city reports growing smuggling activity and wants to know how to proceed.
TEXT.Spanish: El capitán de la guardia de %s2_city informa de un crecimiento del contrabando y y quiere saber cómo proceder.

TEXT.English: Do nothing, their activity stimulates the economy of the city
TEXT.French: Do nothing, their activity stimulates the economy of the city
TEXT.German: Unternehmt nichts. Die Schmuggelware belebt die Wirtschaft der Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: Do nothing, their activity stimulates the economy of the city
TEXT.Spanish: No hagáis nada, sus actividades estimulan la economía de la ciudad

TEXT.English: Run them out of the city, they invite crime
TEXT.French: Run them out of the city, they invite crime
TEXT.German: Jagt die Schmuggler aus der Stadt. Sie öffnen dem Verbrechen Tür und Tor.
TEXT.Italian: Run them out of the city, they invite crime
TEXT.Spanish: Echadlos de la ciudad, invitan al crimen

TEXT.English: Moaning sobs float through the gray streets of %s2_city, filling its citizens with sadness. The sounds flow from a dark, two-storey townhouse. The home appears abandoned and guards are unable to find the source of the crying.
TEXT.French: Moaning sobs float through the gray streets of %s2_city, filling its citizens with sadness. The sounds flow from a dark, two-storey townhouse. The home appears abandoned and guards are unable to find the source of the crying.
TEXT.German: Ein klagendes Schluchzen spukt durch die grauen Straßen der Stadt %s2_city und erfüllt die Bevölkerung mit Traurigkeit. Die Laute dringen aus einem dunklen, zweistöckigen Gebäude. Das Haus selbst scheint verlassen und den Wachen ist es nicht möglich, die Quelle der Schreie zu finden.
TEXT.Italian: Moaning sobs float through the gray streets of %s2_city, filling its citizens with sadness. The sounds flow from a dark, two-storey townhouse. The home appears abandoned and guards are unable to find the source of the crying.
TEXT.Spanish: Moaning sobs float through the gray streets of %s2_city, filling its citizens with sadness. The sounds flow from a dark, two-storey townhouse. The home appears abandoned and guards are unable to find the source of the crying.

TEXT.English: There is little we can do.
TEXT.French: There is little we can do.
TEXT.German: Wir können daran kaum etwas ändern.
TEXT.Italian: There is little we can do.
TEXT.Spanish: There is little we can do.

TEXT.English: Send an adept who is proficient with spirit magic to calm the spirit.
TEXT.French: Send an adept who is proficient with spirit magic to calm the spirit.
TEXT.German: Schickt einen Adepten, der die Geistermagie beherrscht, um den Geist zu besänftigen.
TEXT.Italian: Send an adept who is proficient with spirit magic to calm the spirit.
TEXT.Spanish: Send an adept who is proficient with spirit magic to calm the spirit.

TEXT.English: Delightful, begin charging admission to the home.
TEXT.French: Delightful, begin charging admission to the home.
TEXT.German: Wie entzückend. Verlangt Eintritt für das Haus.
TEXT.Italian: Delightful, begin charging admission to the home.
TEXT.Spanish: Delightful, begin charging admission to the home.

TEXT.English: The people of %s2_city want to rule themselves under Minister Koun, a local politician. They would remain a part of our empire, but become sovereign in their own matters.
TEXT.French: The people of %s2_city want to rule themselves under Minister Koun, a local politician. They would remain a part of our empire, but become sovereign in their own matters.
TEXT.German: Die Bevölkerung der Stadt %s2_city strebt unter Minister Koun, einem lokalen Politiker, die Autonomie an. Die Stadt würde Teil unseres Reiches bleiben, aber ihre Angelegenheiten fortan selbst verwalten.
TEXT.Italian: The people of %s2_city want to rule themselves under Minister Koun, a local politician. They would remain a part of our empire, but become sovereign in their own matters.
TEXT.Spanish: The people of %s2_city want to rule themselves under Minister Koun, a local politician. They would remain a part of our empire, but become sovereign in their own matters.

TEXT.English: Giant spiders have nested in a local mine. How should we respond?
TEXT.French: Des araignées géantes ont envahi une mine locale pour en faire leur nid. Comment devons-nous réagir ?
TEXT.German: Riesenspinnen haben sich in einer örtlichen Mine eingenistet. Was sollen wir unternehmen?
TEXT.Italian: Giant spiders have nested in a local mine. How should we respond?
TEXT.Spanish: Arañas gigantes han anidado en una mina local. ¿Cómo debemos responder?

TEXT.English: Pay some adventurers to deal with them.
TEXT.French: Embauchez un groupe d'aventuriers pour s'en occuper.
TEXT.German: Heuert ein paar Abenteurer an. Sollen die sich mit den Biestern rumschlagen.
TEXT.Italian: Pay some adventurers to deal with them.
TEXT.Spanish: Pagad a algunos aventureros para encargarse de ellas.

TEXT.English: Don't risk them feeding on our people, collapse the mine.
TEXT.French: Ne courons pas le risque qu'elles dévorent nos citoyens. Déclenchez un éboulement pour boucher la mine.
TEXT.German: Wir können nicht riskieren, dass sich die Plage ausbreitet. Bringt die Mine zum Einsturz.
TEXT.Italian: Don't risk them feeding on our people, collapse the mine.
TEXT.Spanish: No nos arriesgaremos a poner a nuestra gente en peligro de ser devorados, colapsad la mina.

TEXT.English: Order the people away from the mine, I will send in soldiers to deal with the spiders.
TEXT.French: Ordonnez à nos citoyens de s'éloigner de la mine. Je vais envoyer l'armée s'en occuper.
TEXT.German: Zieht die Arbeiter aus der Mine ab. Ich werde Truppen entsenden, die sich darum kümmern.
TEXT.Italian: Order the people away from the mine, I will send in soldiers to deal with the spiders.
TEXT.Spanish: Ordenad a la gente alejarse de la mina, enviaré soldados que se encarguen de las arañas.

TEXT.English: Your advisors report that your agricultural advisor has been acting strangely. She has been painting the cows to see if it influences milk production and planting corn on rooftops to keep the foxes from getting into it. They say something must be done.
TEXT.French: Vos conseillers signalent que leur collègue agricole agit curieusement : Elle a peint les vaches pour découvrir si cela modifie la production de lait et a planté du maïs sur les toits pour empêcher les renards d'y rôder. Ils disent qu'il faut intervenir.
TEXT.German: Eure Berater berichten, dass Eure Landwirtschaftsberaterin sich seltsam benimmt. Sie ließ die Kühe anstreichen, um zu testen, ob dies die Milchproduktion erhöht, und Getreide auf Dächern pflanzen, um zu verhindern, dass Füchse sich darin verstecken. Sie sagen, dass etwas unternommen werden müsse.
TEXT.Italian: Your advisors report that your agricultural advisor has been acting strangely. She has been painting the cows to see if it influences milk production and planting corn on rooftops to keep the foxes from getting into it. They say something must be done.
TEXT.Spanish: Vuestros consejeros informa de que nuestra consejera de agricultura ha estado actuando de forma extraña. Ha estado pintando a las vacas para ver si influía en la producción de leche y plantando maíz en los tejados para que los zorros no lo alcancen. Dicen que debe hacerse algo.

TEXT.English: Her experiments may be expensive but I encourage radical thinking among my advisors.
TEXT.French: Peu importe le coût de ses expériences. J'encourage les réflexions radicales parmi mes conseillers.
TEXT.German: Ihre Experimente mögen teuer sein, aber ich befürworte radikale Denkweisen unter meinen Beratern.
TEXT.Italian: Her experiments may be expensive but I encourage radical thinking among my advisors.
TEXT.Spanish: Sus experimentos pueden ser caros pero animo al pensamiento radical entre mis consejeros.

TEXT.English: She's lost her mind, assign a new agriculture advisor.
TEXT.French: Elle a perdu la tête. Qu'on recrute un nouveau conseiller agricole.
TEXT.German: Sie hat den Verstand verloren. Ernennt einen neuen Landwirtschaftsberater.
TEXT.Italian: She's lost her mind, assign a new agriculture advisor.
TEXT.Spanish: Ha perdido la cabeza, asignad un nuevo consejero de agricultura.

TEXT.English: Fire the complaining advisors, she's the only one doing it right.
TEXT.French: Virez-moi ces geignards. Elle est la seule à travaille convenablement.
TEXT.German: Feuert die anderen Berater. Sie ist die Einzige, die es richtig macht. (nur Balseraph)
TEXT.Italian: Fire the complaining advisors, she's the only one doing it right.
TEXT.Spanish: Quemad a los consejeros quejicas, ella es la única que lo hace bien.

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador pleads for your help. You have already made your people into the most powerful empire on Erebus. He would like you leave your people and become the leader of their empire.
TEXT.French: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador pleads for your help. You have already made your people into the most powerful empire on Erebus. He would like you leave your people and become the leader of their empire.
TEXT.German: Der %[s1_civ_adjective]e Botschafter bittet um Eure Hilfe. Ihr habt mit Eurem Volk bereits das mächtigste Reich auf Erebus errichtet. Er ersucht Euch, Euer Volk zu verlassen und fortan die Geschicke seines Reiches zu lenken.
TEXT.Italian: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador pleads for your help. You have already made your people into the most powerful empire on Erebus. He would like you leave your people and become the leader of their empire.
TEXT.Spanish: El embajador %s1_civ_adjective suplica vuestra ayuda. Ya habéis convertido a vuestro pueblo en el imperio más poderoso de todo Erebus. Le gustaría que dejárais vuestro pueblo y os convirtáis en el líder de su imperio.

TEXT.English: No, I will remain the leader of my people.
TEXT.French: No, I will remain the leader of my people.
TEXT.German: Nein, ich werde weiter mein eigenes Volk führen.
TEXT.Italian: No, I will remain the leader of my people.
TEXT.Spanish: No, seguiré siendo el líder de mi pueblo.

TEXT.English: Yes, I will lead your pathetic nation out of its squalor.
TEXT.French: Yes, I will lead your pathetic nation out of its squalor.
TEXT.German: Ja, ich werde euer erbärmliches Volk aus seinem Elend führen.
TEXT.Italian: Yes, I will lead your pathetic nation out of its squalor.
TEXT.Spanish: Sí, lideraré a vuestra patética nación fuera de su escoria.

TEXT.English: Aggressive
TEXT.French: Aggressif
TEXT.German: Aggressiv
TEXT.Italian: Aggressive
TEXT.Spanish: Agresivo

TEXT.English: Arcane
TEXT.French: Arcaniste
TEXT.German: Magisch begabt
TEXT.Italian: Arcane
TEXT.Spanish: Arcano

TEXT.English: Charismatic
TEXT.French: Charismatique
TEXT.German: Charismatisch
TEXT.Italian: Charismatic
TEXT.Spanish: Carismático

TEXT.English: Creative
TEXT.French: Créatif
TEXT.German: Kreativ
TEXT.Italian: Creative
TEXT.Spanish: Creativo

TEXT.English: Expansive
TEXT.French: Accessible
TEXT.German: Expansiv
TEXT.Italian: Expansive
TEXT.Spanish: Expansivo

TEXT.English: Financial
TEXT.French: Financier
TEXT.German: Kommerziell
TEXT.Italian: Financial
TEXT.Spanish: Financiero

TEXT.English: Industrious
TEXT.French: Travailleur
TEXT.German: Industriell
TEXT.Italian: Industrious
TEXT.Spanish: Diligente

TEXT.English: Your traits have changed (mouseover your flag to see your new traits).
TEXT.French: Vos traits de caractère ont changé (placez le curseur sur votre drapeau pour voir les nouveaux).
TEXT.German: Eure Eigenschaften haben sich geändert. (Fahrt mit der Maus über Eure Flagge um sie Euch anzusehen.)
TEXT.Italian: Your traits have changed (mouseover your flag to see your new traits).
TEXT.Spanish: Vuestros rasgos han cambiado (pon el cursor encima de tu bandera para ver tus nuevos rasgos).

TEXT.English: Organized
TEXT.French: Organisé
TEXT.German: Organisiert
TEXT.Italian: Organized
TEXT.Spanish: Organizado

TEXT.English: Philosophical
TEXT.French: Philosophe
TEXT.German: Philosopisch
TEXT.Italian: Philosophical
TEXT.Spanish: Filosófico

TEXT.English: Protective
TEXT.French: Protecteur
TEXT.German: Schützend
TEXT.Italian: Protective
TEXT.Spanish: Protector

TEXT.English: Raiders
TEXT.French: Pillard
TEXT.German: Räuberisch
TEXT.Italian: Raiders
TEXT.Spanish: Incursores

TEXT.English: Spiritual
TEXT.French: Spirituel
TEXT.German: Spirituell
TEXT.Italian: Spiritual
TEXT.Spanish: Espiritual

TEXT.English: The governor of %s2_city reports finding documents detailing a plan to overthrow the city. The creator of the documents is unknown but the governor suspects it is from your own citizenry.
TEXT.French: Le gouverneur de %s2_city a découvert un des documents détaillant un plan pour envahir la ville. Le créateur de ces documents est inconnu mais le gouverneur suspecte l'un de vos propres citoyens.
TEXT.German: Der Bürgermeister der Stadt %s2_city berichtet vom Fund detaillierter Pläne für einen Umsturz in der Stadt. Die Urheber sind unbekannt, doch der Bürgermeister vermutet sie in Eurer eigenen Bürgerschaft.
TEXT.Italian: The governor of %s2_city reports finding documents detailing a plan to overthrow the city. The creator of the documents is unknown but the governor suspects it is from your own citizenry.
TEXT.Spanish: El gobernador de %s2_city informa de que ha encontrado documentos que detallan un plan para invadir la ciudad. El creador de los documentos es desconocido, pero el gobernador sospecha que es de vuestros propios ciudadanos.

TEXT.English: Ignore them, the loyalty of my people is beyond question.
TEXT.French: Ignorez-le, la loyauté de mon peuple est au-dela de tout soupçon.
TEXT.German: Ignoriert das. Die Loyalität meines Volks steht außer Frage.
TEXT.Italian: Ignore them, the loyalty of my people is beyond question.
TEXT.Spanish: Ignoradlos, la lealtad de mi pueblo es incuestionable.

TEXT.English: Order all local militia to begin a search of the city, question every citizen and search every house.
TEXT.French: Ordonner à la milice locale de commencer une recherche dans la ville, de questionner tous les citoyens et de fouiller toutes les maisons.
TEXT.German: Die Bürgerwehr soll damit beginnen, die Stadt zu durchsuchen. Befragt jeden Bürger und durchsucht jedes Haus.
TEXT.Italian: Order all local militia to begin a search of the city, question every citizen and search every house.
TEXT.Spanish: Ordenad a toda la milicia local que empiece a rastrear la ciudad, que interroguen a todos los ciudadanos y busquen por todas las casas.

TEXT.English: Invite the people to a feast, a thinning is required. (requires the Calabim civilization)
TEXT.French: Inviter le peuple à un festin, un amincisseur est demandé. (requiert la civilisation Calabim )
TEXT.German: Lasst uns ein großes Festmahl veranstalten. Mir scheint ein Aderlass vonnöten. (nur Calabim)
TEXT.Italian: Invite the people to a feast, a thinning is required. (requires the Calabim civilization)
TEXT.Spanish: Invitad al pueblo a un festín, se necesita un adelgazamiento. (requiere la civilización Calabim)

TEXT.English: No, we will keep the resources we have.
TEXT.French: Non. Nous garderons nos ressources en l'état.
TEXT.German: Nein, wir werden besser die Ressourcen behalten, die wir haben.
TEXT.Italian: No, we will keep the resources we have.
TEXT.Spanish: No, mantendremos los recursos que tenemos.

TEXT.English: A dwarven adept has discovered the secret of turning Gold into Copper. He asks if you would like to hire him to transform your local vein of Gold into Copper?
TEXT.French: Un adepte nain a découvert le secret de la transmutation « Or vers Cuivre » et propose de convertir votre gisement aurifère en gisement cuprifère. Êtes-vous intéressé ?
TEXT.German: Ein zwergischer Adept hat entdeckt, wie Gold in Kupfer verwandelt werden kann. Er möchte wissen, ob Ihr ihn anheuern wollt, um Euer örtliches Goldvorkommen in ein Kupfervorkommen zu verwandeln?
TEXT.Italian: A dwarven adept has discovered the secret of turning Gold into Copper. He asks if you would like to hire him to transform your local vein of Gold into Copper?
TEXT.Spanish: Un adepto enano ha descubierto el secreto de convertir el oro en cobre. Pregunta si queréis contratarlo para transformar vuestra vena de Oro local en Cobre

TEXT.English: Yes, we could use the Copper to make weapons for our units.
TEXT.French: C'est d'accord. Le cuivre nous permettrait de forger des armes pour nos unités.
TEXT.German: Ja, wir könnten das Kupfer verwenden, um Waffen für unsere Einheiten herzustellen.
TEXT.Italian: Yes, we could use the Copper to make weapons for our units.
TEXT.Spanish: Sí, podríamos usar el cobre para fabricar armas para nuestras unidades.

TEXT.English: A dwarven adept has discovered the secret of turning Copper into Gold. He asks if you would like to hire him to transform your local vein of Copper into Gold?
TEXT.French: Un adepte nain a découvert le secret de la transmutation « Cuivre vers Or » et propose de convertir votre gisement cuprifère en gisement aurifère. Êtes-vous intéressé ?
TEXT.German: Ein zwergischer Adept hat entdeckt, wie Kupfer in Gold verwandelt werden kann. Er möchte wissen, ob Ihr ihn anheuern wollt, um Euer örtliches Kupfervorkommen in ein Goldvorkommen zu verwandeln?
TEXT.Italian: A dwarven adept has discovered the secret of turning Copper into Gold. He asks if you would like to hire him to transform your local vein of Copper into Gold?
TEXT.Spanish: Un adepto enano ha descubierto el secreto de transformar el cobre en oro. Pregunta si queréis contratarlo para transformar vuestra vena local de Cobre en Oro

TEXT.English: Yes, we could use the Gold to fill our vaults.
TEXT.French: Bien sûr. Rien de tel que l'or pour remplir nos coffres.
TEXT.German: Ja, wir könnten das Gold gebrauchen, um unsere Schatzkammer aufzufüllen.
TEXT.Italian: Yes, we could use the Gold to fill our vaults.
TEXT.Spanish: Sí, podríamos usar el oro para llenar nuestras arcas.

TEXT.English: An old pirate offers to sell you his only item of value, a map to treasure buried long ago.
TEXT.French: Un vieux pirate essaie de vous vendre son seul objet de valeur : une vieille carte au trésor.
TEXT.German: An old pirate offers to sell you his only item of value, a map to treasure buried long ago.
TEXT.Italian: An old pirate offers to sell you his only item of value, a map to treasure buried long ago.
TEXT.Spanish: An old pirate offers to sell you his only item of value, a map to treasure buried long ago.

TEXT.English: It seems a reasonable price, we will take it.
TEXT.French: Le prix semble raisonnable. Je prends.
TEXT.German: It seems a reasonable price, we will take it.
TEXT.Italian: It seems a reasonable price, we will take it.
TEXT.Spanish: It seems a reasonable price, we will take it.

TEXT.English: No, why trade gold I have now for gold I have to send men across the world for?
TEXT.French: Certainement pas. Pourquoi irais-je dépenser mon or bien réel pour de l'or hypothétique à l'autre bout du monde ?
TEXT.German: No, why trade gold I have now for gold I have to send men across the world for?
TEXT.Italian: No, why trade gold I have now for gold I have to send men across the world for?
TEXT.Spanish: No, why trade gold I have now for gold I have to send men across the world for?

TEXT.English: A two-headed cow has been born in your lands. Your people are unsure what it means and they come to you for advice.
TEXT.French: Une vache à teux têtes est née sur vos terres. Vos citoyens s'interrogent sur la signification de ce présage et viennent vous demander une interprétation.
TEXT.German: Eine zweiköpfiges Kalb wurde in Eurem Land geboren. Eure Untertanen sind sich unsicher, was dieses Zeichen bedeutet, und fragen deshalb nach Eurem Rat.
TEXT.Italian: A two-headed cow has been born in your lands. Your people are unsure what it means and they come to you for advice.
TEXT.Spanish: A two-headed cow has been born in your lands. Your people are unsure what it means and they come to you for advice.

TEXT.English: This is a good omen.
TEXT.French: Les auspices sont favorables.
TEXT.German: Dies ist ein gutes Zeichen.
TEXT.Italian: This is a good omen.
TEXT.Spanish: This is a good omen.

TEXT.English: This is a bad omen.
TEXT.French: C'est de mauvais augure.
TEXT.German: Dies ist ein schlechtes Zeichen.
TEXT.Italian: This is a bad omen.
TEXT.Spanish: This is a bad omen.

TEXT.English: The Undercouncil has offered additional support to your empire.
TEXT.French: Le Conseil Souterrain offre de soutenir votre empire.
TEXT.German: Der Geheime Rat bietet Eurem Reich Unterstützung an.
TEXT.Italian: The Undercouncil has offered additional support to your empire.
TEXT.Spanish: El Consejo Oculto ofrece soporte adicional a vuestro imperio.

TEXT.English: Request that some Undercouncil investigators be stationed in your empire.
TEXT.French: Demander à ce que des Investigateurs du Conseil Souterrain stationnent dans votre empire.
TEXT.German: Ersucht darum, dass einige Ermittler des Geheimen Rates in unserem Reich stationiert werden.
TEXT.Italian: Request that some Undercouncil investigators be stationed in your empire.
TEXT.Spanish: Pedís que algunos investigadores del Consejo Oculto sean estacionados en vuestro imperio.

TEXT.English: Allow the Undercouncil to train your Rogue units.
TEXT.French: Permettre au Conseil Souterrain d'entraîner vos unités de reconnaissance.
TEXT.German: Erlaubt dem Geheimen Rat, unsere Erkundungs-Einheiten auszubilden.
TEXT.Italian: Allow the Undercouncil to train your Rogue units.
TEXT.Spanish: Permitís al Consejo Oculto entrenar a vuestras unidades de reconocimiento.

TEXT.English: Send your scholars to learn from the Undercouncil researchers.
TEXT.French: Envoyer vos érudits étudier auprès des chercheurs du Conseil Souterrain.
TEXT.German: Schickt unsere Gelehrten, auf dass sie von den Forschern des Rats lernen.
TEXT.Italian: Send your scholars to learn from the Undercouncil researchers.
TEXT.Spanish: Enviáis a vuestros escolares a aprender de los investigadores del Cosejo Oculto.

TEXT.English: Fishermen share a legend of an ancient people, called the Aifons, that breathed water and air. These people were destroyed during the Age of Magic though the cause of that destruction is unknown. The legend says that their ancient homeland, a distant island, remains and may be the home of some lost treasure, or the force that destroyed them.
TEXT.French: Fishermen share a legend of an ancient people, called the Aifons, that breathed water and air. These people were destroyed during the Age of Magic though the cause of that destruction is unknown. The legend says that their ancient homeland, a distant island, remains and may be the home of some lost treasure, or the force that destroyed them.
TEXT.German: Unter Fischern erzählt man sich die Legende von einem alten Volk, genannt die Aifons, die Wasser und Luft atmeten. Dieses Volk wurde während des Zeitalters der Magie vernichtet, wobei der Grund der Vernichtung im Dunkeln liegt. Die Legende besagt weiter, dass ihr altes Reich, eine entfernte Insel, geblieben ist und die Heimat eines verlorenen Schatzes sein könnte. Oder der Macht, die das Volk vernichtete.
TEXT.Italian: Fishermen share a legend of an ancient people, called the Aifons, that breathed water and air. These people were destroyed during the Age of Magic though the cause of that destruction is unknown. The legend says that their ancient homeland, a distant island, remains and may be the home of some lost treasure, or the force that destroyed them.
TEXT.Spanish: Fishermen share a legend of an ancient people, called the Aifons, that breathed water and air. These people were destroyed during the Age of Magic though the cause of that destruction is unknown. The legend says that their ancient homeland, a distant island, remains and may be the home of some lost treasure, or the force that destroyed them.

TEXT.English: There are legends of a tunnel that stretches from creation to the lands of the dead. It is known as Bradeline's Well and no one knows what treasures or nightmares exist within it.
TEXT.French: There are legends of a tunnel that stretches from creation to the lands of the dead. It is known as Bradeline's Well and no one knows what treasures or nightmares exist within it.
TEXT.German: Es gibt Legenden eines Tunnel, welcher sich von der Schöpfung direkt bis in das Land der Toten erstreckt. Er ist bekannt als Bradelines Brunnen und niemand weiß sicher um die Schätze oder Albträume, welche in ihm existieren könnten.
TEXT.Italian: There are legends of a tunnel that stretches from creation to the lands of the dead. It is known as Bradeline's Well and no one knows what treasures or nightmares exist within it.
TEXT.Spanish: There are legends of a tunnel that stretches from creation to the lands of the dead. It is known as Bradeline's Well and no one knows what treasures or nightmares exist within it.

TEXT.English: Long ago Kylorin is said to have locked Barbatos, the head of the School of Necromancy, in his own Sepulcher. Explorers report that they may have found that legendary site, but the massive stone that held the Sepulcher closed has been broken in two.
TEXT.French: Long ago Kylorin is said to have locked Barbatos, the head of the School of Necromancy, in his own Sepulcher. Explorers report that they may have found that legendary site, but the massive stone that held the Sepulcher closed has been broken in two.
TEXT.German: Es wird erzählt, dass Kylorin vor langer Zeit Barbados, den Meister der Schule der Nekromantie, in seiner eigenen Grabstätte eingesperrt haben soll. Entdecker berichten, dass sie diesen legendären Ort gefunden haben, aber der schwere Stein, welcher die Grabstätte verschloß, sei zerbrochen.
TEXT.Italian: Long ago Kylorin is said to have locked Barbatos, the head of the School of Necromancy, in his own Sepulcher. Explorers report that they may have found that legendary site, but the massive stone that held the Sepulcher closed has been broken in two.
TEXT.Spanish: Long ago Kylorin is said to have locked Barbatos, the head of the School of Necromancy, in his own Sepulcher. Explorers report that they may have found that legendary site, but the massive stone that held the Sepulcher closed has been broken in two.

TEXT.English: Your people speak of a great stone figure that is carved into the mountainside. They warn against going too close to the figure as powerful creatures roost in the caves around the mountain. Old maps claim that the figure used to be on another mountain entirely, leading many to speculate that from time to time the Guardian may arise and wander about on its own.
TEXT.French: Your people speak of a great stone figure that is carved into the mountainside. They warn against going too close to the figure as powerful creatures roost in the caves around the mountain. Old maps claim that the figure used to be on another mountain entirely, leading many to speculate that from time to time the Guardian may arise and wander about on its own.
TEXT.German: Euer Volk erzählt sich von einer großen Steinfigur, welche in den Berg hineingeschlagen wurde. Sie warnen Euch, diesem Berg nicht zu nahe zu kommen, da mächtige Kreaturen in den Höhlen um diesen Berg herum ruhen sollen. Alte Karten behaupten, dass diese Steinfigur schon an anderen Bergen zu sehen gewesen wäre. Dies führte zu Spekulationen, ob sich dieser Wächter nicht von Zeit zu Zeit erheben und von selbst aus wandern könne.
TEXT.Italian: Your people speak of a great stone figure that is carved into the mountainside. They warn against going too close to the figure as powerful creatures roost in the caves around the mountain. Old maps claim that the figure used to be on another mountain entirely, leading many to speculate that from time to time the Guardian may arise and wander about on its own.
TEXT.Spanish: Your people speak of a great stone figure that is carved into the mountainside. They warn against going too close to the figure as powerful creatures roost in the caves around the mountain. Old maps claim that the figure used to be on another mountain entirely, leading many to speculate that from time to time the Guardian may arise and wander about on its own.

TEXT.English: Your scouts report that you may be close to Letum Frigus, the ancient battleground where Kylorin defeated the God of Winter. Surely our nation should lay claim to such a legendary site.
TEXT.French: Your scouts report that you may be close to Letum Frigus, the ancient battleground where Kylorin defeated the God of Winter. Surely our nation should lay claim to such a legendary site.
TEXT.German: Eure Späher berichten über die Nähe zu Letum Frigus, dem alten Schlachtfeld, auf dem Kylorin den Wintergott besiegte. Natürlich sollte unser Reich die Herrschaft über diesen legendären Ort beanspruchen.
TEXT.Italian: Your scouts report that you may be close to Letum Frigus, the ancient battleground where Kylorin defeated the God of Winter. Surely our nation should lay claim to such a legendary site.
TEXT.Spanish: Your scouts report that you may be close to Letum Frigus, the ancient battleground where Kylorin defeated the God of Winter. Surely our nation should lay claim to such a legendary site.

TEXT.English: Your scouts return with evidence that Letum Frigus, the last place Mulcarn was seen on Erebus, may lay nearby. If we can make a pilgrimage to that site it will embolden our people.
TEXT.French: Your scouts return with evidence that Letum Frigus, the last place Mulcarn was seen on Erebus, may lay nearby. If we can make a pilgrimage to that site it will embolden our people.
TEXT.German: Eure Späher kommen mit dem Beweis heim, dass Letum Frigus, der letzten Stelle, wo Mulcarn auf Erubus gesehen ward, in der Nähe liegt. Wenn wir eine Pilgerreise zu diesem Ort unternehmen könnten, würde dies unser Volk ermutigen.
TEXT.Italian: Your scouts return with evidence that Letum Frigus, the last place Mulcarn was seen on Erebus, may lay nearby. If we can make a pilgrimage to that site it will embolden our people.
TEXT.Spanish: Your scouts return with evidence that Letum Frigus, the last place Mulcarn was seen on Erebus, may lay nearby. If we can make a pilgrimage to that site it will embolden our people.

TEXT.English: Rumors tell of a great temple to Bhall, whose top burns with a fire fueled by the corpses of the angels that stood against her when she fell. Your people demand that this abomination, the Pyre of the Seraphic, be destroyed.
TEXT.French: Rumors tell of a great temple to Bhall, whose top burns with a fire fueled by the corpses of the angels that stood against her when she fell. Your people demand that this abomination, the Pyre of the Seraphic, be destroyed.
TEXT.German: Gerüchte sprechen von einem großen Tempel, der Bhall geweiht ist und an dessen Spitze ein Feuer brennt, das mit den Leichen jener Engel angefacht wird, die sich ihr entgegenstellten, als sie fiel. Euer Volk verlangt, dass diese Abscheulichkeit, der Scheiterhaufen der Engel, zerstört wird.
TEXT.Italian: Rumors tell of a great temple to Bhall, whose top burns with a fire fueled by the corpses of the angels that stood against her when she fell. Your people demand that this abomination, the Pyre of the Seraphic, be destroyed.
TEXT.Spanish: Los rumores hablan acerca de un gran templo a Bhall, cuya cima arde con un fuego alimentado por los cuerpos de los ángeles que se pusieron en su contra cuando cayó. Vuestro pueblo demanda que esta abominación, la Pira de los Serafines, sea destruida.

TEXT.English: Veil worshipers in %s2_city threaten to burn down a Temple of the Order.
TEXT.French: Des adorateurs du Voile à %s2_city menacent de bruler un temple de l'Ordre.
TEXT.German: Anbeter des Schleiers in der Stadt %s2_city drohen damit, einen Tempel der Weisung niederzubrennen
TEXT.Italian: Veil worshipers in %s2_city threaten to burn down a Temple of the Order.
TEXT.Spanish: Los seguidores del Velo en %s2_city amenazan con quemar un Templo del Orden.

TEXT.English: Order the local militia to help burn down the temple
TEXT.French: Ordonner à la milice locale d'aider à bruler le temple
TEXT.German: Ruft die Bügerwehr herbei, um ihnen dabei zu helfen, den Tempel niederzubrennen.
TEXT.Italian: Order the local militia to help burn down the temple
TEXT.Spanish: Ordenad a la milicia local que ayude en la quema del templo

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]The Temple of the Order will be destroyed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Order religion from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Veil cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Order cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Le temple de l'Ordre sera détruit[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de chances d'enlever la religion de l'Ordre de la ville[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_HAPPY] dans les villes du Voile[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_UNHAPPY] dans les villes de l'Ordre
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Zerstörung des Tempels der Weisung[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass die Religion der Weisung aus der Stadt entfernt wird[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_HAPPY] in den Städten des Aschfahlen Schleiers[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_UNHAPPY] in den Städten der Weisung
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]The Temple of the Order will be destroyed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Order religion from the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Veil cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Order cities
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]El Templo del Orden será destruido[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de eliminar la religión del Oden de la ciudad[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_HAPPY] en la ciudades del Velo[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_UNHAPPY] en las ciudades del Orden

TEXT.English: Do nothing, let the people determine their own fate.
TEXT.French: Ne rien faire , laisser le peuple décider de son propre destin.
TEXT.German: Tut nichts. Lasst sie ihr eigenes Schicksal bestimmen.
TEXT.Italian: Do nothing, let the people determine their own fate.
TEXT.Spanish: No hagáis nada, dejad que el pueblo determine su propio destino.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]50% chance the Temple of the Order will be destroyed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance of -1 population[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Order religion from the city
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]50% de chances que le temple de l'Ordre soit détruit[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de chances de -1 citoyen[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de chances d'enlever la religion de l'Ordre de la ville
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass der Tempel der Weisung zerstört wird[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass die Bevölkerung um 1 verringert wird[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% Chance, dass die Religion der Weisung aus der Stadt entfernt wird
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]50% chance the Temple of the Order will be destroyed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance of -1 population[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance to remove the Order religion from the city
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de que el Templo del Orden sea destruido[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de -1 de población[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% de probabilidades de eliminar la religión del Orden de la ciudad

TEXT.English: Send the local militia to protect the temple.
TEXT.French: Envoyer la milice locale protéger le temple.
TEXT.German: Schickt die Bürgerwehr, um den Tempel zu beschützen.
TEXT.Italian: Send the local militia to protect the temple.
TEXT.Spanish: Enviad a la milicia local para proteger el templo.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Order cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Veil cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_HAPPY] dans les villes de l'Ordre[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 tours de [ICON_UNHAPPY] dans les villes du Voile
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_HAPPY] in den Städten der Weisung[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Runden lang [ICON_UNHAPPY] in den Städten des Aschfahlen Schleiers
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_HAPPY] in Order cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turns of [ICON_UNHAPPY] in Veil cities
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_HAPPY] en las ciudades del Orden[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 turnos de [ICON_UNHAPPY] en las ciudades del Velo

TEXT.English: A volcanic explosion shakes the surrounding countryside. Smoke rises from the fractured mountain peak. Fortunately no one was injured in the blast, but your people wonder how long they will remain safe in the shadow of the volcano.
TEXT.French: A volcanic explosion shakes the surrounding countryside. Smoke rises from the fractured mountain peak. Fortunately no one was injured in the blast, but your people wonder how long they will remain safe in the shadow of the volcano.
TEXT.German: Der Ausbruch eines Vulkans lässt das umliegende Land erzittern. Eine Rauchwolke steigt von der aufgebrochenen Bergspitze auf. Glücklicherweise wurde bei dem Ausbruch niemand verletzt, aber Eure Bevölkerung fragt sich, wie lange sie im Schatten des Vulkans noch sicher sein werden.
TEXT.Italian: A volcanic explosion shakes the surrounding countryside. Smoke rises from the fractured mountain peak. Fortunately no one was injured in the blast, but your people wonder how long they will remain safe in the shadow of the volcano.
TEXT.Spanish: A volcanic explosion shakes the surrounding countryside. Smoke rises from the fractured mountain peak. Fortunately no one was injured in the blast, but your people wonder how long they will remain safe in the shadow of the volcano.

TEXT.English: There is evidence that one of our regiments has been torturing prisoners. They argue that they use the prisoners in their war games, to make it more exciting and more realistic for their men.
TEXT.French: There is evidence that one of our regiments has been torturing prisoners. They argue that they use the prisoners in their war games, to make it more exciting and more realistic for their men.
TEXT.German: Es gibt Beweise, dass eine unserer Einheiten Gefangene gefoltert hat. Deren Mitglieder behaupten, dass sie die Gefangenen in ihren Kriegsspielen verwenden, um den Männern ein spannenderes und realistischeres Erlebnis zu bieten.
TEXT.Italian: There is evidence that one of our regiments has been torturing prisoners. They argue that they use the prisoners in their war games, to make it more exciting and more realistic for their men.
TEXT.Spanish: There is evidence that one of our regiments has been torturing prisoners. They argue that they use the prisoners in their war games, to make it more exciting and more realistic for their men.

TEXT.English: Have the unit decommissioned.
TEXT.French: Have the unit decommissioned.
TEXT.German: Löst die Einheit auf.
TEXT.Italian: Have the unit decommissioned.
TEXT.Spanish: Have the unit decommissioned.

TEXT.English: Reprimand the unit commander.
TEXT.French: Reprimand the unit commander.
TEXT.German: Erteilt dem Kommandeur der Einheit einen strengen Verweis.
TEXT.Italian: Reprimand the unit commander.
TEXT.Spanish: Reprimand the unit commander.

TEXT.English: So?
TEXT.French: So?
TEXT.German: Tatsächlich?
TEXT.Italian: So?
TEXT.Spanish: So?

TEXT.English: Congratulate the unit commander for his ferocity.
TEXT.French: Congratulate the unit commander for his ferocity.
TEXT.German: Gratuliert dem Kommandeur der Einheit für seine Grausamkeit.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulate the unit commander for his ferocity.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulate the unit commander for his ferocity.

TEXT.English: A farmer in %s2_city has been bitten by a wolf. Some say the wolf was cursed.
TEXT.French: A farmer in %s2_city has been bitten by a wolf. Some say the wolf was cursed.
TEXT.German: Ein Bauer in der Stadt %s2_city wurde von einem Wolf gebissen. Einige sagen, dass der Wolf verflucht war.
TEXT.Italian: A farmer in %s2_city has been bitten by a wolf. Some say the wolf was cursed.
TEXT.Spanish: Un granjero de %s2_city ha sido mordido por un lobo. Algunos dicen que el lobo estaba maldito.

TEXT.English: Let the local militia handle it.
TEXT.French: Let the local militia handle it.
TEXT.German: Lasst das durch die Bürgerwehr regeln.
TEXT.Italian: Let the local militia handle it.
TEXT.Spanish: Que la milicia local se encargue de eso.

TEXT.English: Kill the farmer, we will take no chances with the city's safety.
TEXT.French: Kill the farmer, we will take no chances with the city's safety.
TEXT.German: Tötet den Bauern. Wir werden nicht die Sicherheit der Stadt gefährden.
TEXT.Italian: Kill the farmer, we will take no chances with the city's safety.
TEXT.Spanish: Matad al granjero, no pondremos en juego la seguridad de las ciudades.

TEXT.English: Lock the man in the Dungeon, if he is cursed they can kill him.
